loans.name: Edmonde

texts.fr:
36 ans, mariée et mère de deux enfants, Edmonde est une femme très simple mais travailleuse. Au paravant, elle travaillait dans une entreprise de zone franche mais à cause de la crise politique de 2009, elle était en chômage technique en 2011 car l'entreprise était fermé.
De ce fait, elle avait dû trouver une autre activité source de revenu pour continuer d'aider son mari à soutenir sa famille. En 2012, elle s'est orientée dans le secteur commerce. Elle dirige un stand d'alimentation qu'on appelle au pays "kafe sy mofo". Il s'agit de fabrication et vente des boissons chaudes (café, thé, lait, chocolat, lait) et des beignets de spécialités malagasy (mogasy, ramanonaka, menakely, makasoka).
Edmonde envisage de développer et améliorer  son affaire et elle demande un prêt pou pouvoir y parvenir. En plus, elle souhaite ainsi améliorer le niveau de vie de la famille.
texts.en: Edmonde is 36 years old, married, and the mother of two children.  She is a simple, yet a very hardworking woman.  In the past, she used to work for a company located in a free zone, but because of the political crisis of 2009, she was laid off in 2011 when the company shut down.  For these reasons, she had to find another source of income to help her husband support the family.  In 2012, she became involved in retail business.  She now runs a food stall, called a "kafe sy mofo" in Madagascar.  She prepares and sells hot drinks (coffee, tea, milk, chocolate milk) as well as various types of malagasy fritters (mogasy, ramanonaka, menakely, makasoka).  Edmonde is planning to develop and improve her business and she is requesting a loan to reach her goals.  She also hopes to be able to improve her family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy one bag of "malagasy" rice, one bag of sugar, one bag of flour, 50 kilos of sugar and 10 liters of cooking oil.

loans.name: Flor Marina

texts.es:
Con su sonrisa y gran corazón, Flor ha tenido una gran acogida en su barrio desde que abrió su restaurante en casa hace 30 años con gran esfuerzo y con un deseo en su mente, el de salir adelante y mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.

El crédito que solicita es para comprar insumos e ingredientes como harina, maíz, carne, pollo, aliños, entre otros.

Con estos ingredientes podrá continuar cocinando y preparando las delicias que con sus manos trabajadoras ha venido ofreciendo y sirviendo.

Apoya a Flor con su negocio y has que su vida sea mejor con un préstamo!
texts.en:
With her smile and her great heart, Flor has had a good reception in her neighborhood ever since she opened a restaurant in her house 30 years ago with great effort, and a wish to improve her financial situation and her family's living conditions.

The loan she is requesting is to buy ingredients, such as flour, corn, meat, chicken, and dressings.

With these ingredients she will continue to cook and prepare the delicacies she offers and serves by hand.

Support Flor with her business and make her life better with a loan!

loans.use: to buy ingredients, such as flour, corn, meat, chicken, and dressings.

loans.name: Minavarkan

texts.ru: Минаваркан, 49 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. У нее высшее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Минаваркан занимается перепродажей риса на рынке города. Благодаря упорному труду Минаваркан, в на сегодняшний день имеется товар в обороте на сумму 50,000 сом (KGS). Ежемесячный доход составляет 19,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Минаваркан обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) на покупку риса для перепродажи. Доходы от кредита Минаваркан планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса.
texts.en: Minavarkan is 49 years old, married, and raising four children with her husband.  She has a higher education.  As the main source of income for her family, she resells rice at the market, in town.  Thanks to her very hard work, she currently has 50,000 som (KGS) worth of merchandise.  She makes a monthly income of 19,000 som (KGS).  In order to further grow her business, she has turned to Bai Tushum and requested a loan of 80,000 som (KGS) to buy rice for resale.  She is planning to reinvest the earnings from her loan into further developing her business.

loans.use: to increase her sales of rice.

loans.name: Carlos Mario

texts.es:
Carlos, en su incansable búsqueda de una mejor vida y una mejor estabilidad económica, inicio con un negocio de barbería prestando su servicio en su local en el municipio de Medellín, un municipio donde el empuje y verraquera es un referente muy importante de los habitantes de esta zona.

El trabaja todos los días en horarios muy variados y siempre está ocupado en algún servicio ya que es muy solicitado por su buen trabajo.

Solicita un aliento económico para realizar la compra de cuchillas, gel, e instrumentos de trabajo que le hacen falta, además de cambiar un espejo en su negocio.

Hoy en día se siente feliz por el buen trabajo que hasta ahora ha realizado y que le ha permitido gozar de un trabajo más estable.

Con un crédito podrás apoyar a Carlos a continuar con su proyecto de vida!¡
texts.en:
Carlos, in a tireless quest for a better life and greater economic stability, started a barber shop business offering his services in a space in the city of Medellín, where initiative and enthusiasm are a very important example for the residents of the area.  He works a very different schedule every day and he's always busy with some job, because his good work is in very high demand.

Carlos is requesting some economic help to buy razor blades, gel, and working tools he needs.  He's also going to change a mirror in his business.

Currently he's happy because of the good work he has done up to now, which has allowed him to enjoy a more stable job.  With a loan you'll be able to help Carlos continue with his life project!

loans.use: to buy razor blades, gel, and work tools he needs, as well as to change a mirror in his business

loans.name: Carmen Rosa

texts.es:
Sin mucho capital, Carmen montó su taller de confección con el ánimo de generar ingresos con los cuales pueda sostener los gastos de su hogar donde convive con sus hijos. 

La actividad la aprendió de su familia y esto le ha permitido realizar trabajos que se caracterizan por su buena calidad y su puntualidad en la entrega. 

Con sus trabajos, Carmen ha logrado captar un gran número de clientes que le han garantizado muy buenas ventas mensuales, por lo que espera que su negocio siga creciendo y posteriormente pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas. 

Con la finalidad de responder a la demanda sus clientes, Carmen busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de insumos como tela y para la adecuación locativa de una parte de su taller.

Carmen espera que así su familia pueda gozar de unos mejores ingresos los cuales les permitan tener una mejor calidad de vida y una educación de mejor calidad. 

Además, Carmen espera que si su negocio sigue ampliándose a un buen ritmo y que en su taller pueda generar como mínimo un empleo para una persona que lo requiera y no tenga oportunidades laborales.
texts.en:
Without a lot of capital, Carmen set up her sewing workshop with the goal of earning an income so she can cover the household expenses where she lives with her children.  She learned the work from her family and it has allowed her to do work known for its good quality and for her punctuality.  Carmen has managed to attract a large number of customers with her work, which has ensured very good monthly sales for her.  She hopes her business keeps growing and that later she can generate work for the neediest people.

Carmen's requesting a loan so she can buy supplies such as fabric and to fix up the space in part of her shop.

Carmen hopes her family can enjoy better income and have a better quality of life and education.  She also hopes that, if her business keeps growing at a good pace, she'll be able to generate at least one job in her shop for someone who needs it and doesn't have work opportunities.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as fabric and to fix up the space in part of her shop

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan es de la ciudad de Luque, es estudiante de la carrera de Administración de Empresas, vive con sus padres y comenta que está estudiando para así llegar a obtener buenos ingresos y ayudar a su familia.
Al terminar su carrera se ve trabajando en una empresa privada y de esa forma poder seguir aplicar todo lo que aprendió.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera y con ello poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Juan is from the city of Luque. He is a student in the career of Business Administration. He lives with his parents and says he is studying to get good income and help his family.

Upon completing his career, he sees himself working at a private company and this way be able to continue to apply what he learned.

He is asking for this loan to be able to pay his career fees and thus manage to continue with his studies.

loans.use: to pay college fees.

loans.name: Pedro Enrique

texts.es:
La venta de frutas y verduras, es la actividad en la cual se desempeña Pedro, un hombre con empuje y perseverancia para sacar adelante su propio negocio y a su familia.

El se dedica a esta actividad desde hace más de 4 años trabajando desde muy temprano en la mañana todos los días para ofrecer sus alimentos.
Trabaja con un familiar todos los días durante 14 horas.
Decidió iniciar este proyecto al ver la necesidad de obtener más ingresos para su familia y ya que no tenía la educación suficiente para otro cargo, opto por la venta de frutas y verduras.

Es una hombre simpático y servicial, siempre dispuesto a atender las inquietudes y deseos de sus clientes.

El pide un auxilio económico con la Corporación Interactuar para comprar una un amplio surtido de verduras y de esta manera abastecerse y vender una mayor cantidad de alimentos.

Su sueño es tener un local en cual pueda vender tranquilo y cómodamente sus alimentos.

Presta y aporta hoy, anímate!
texts.en:
Pedro's work is to sell fruit and vegetables. He is a man with drive and persistence to improve his business and the financial situation of his family.

He has been making a living this way for more than four years. He is working every day from early in the morning to offer his food. He is working with a relative every day for 14 hours.

He decided to start this project because he saw the need in a higher income for his family. Because he does not yet have the education for another trade, he opted for selling fruit and vegetables. He is a nice and servicing man, always ready to meet the concerns and wishes of his clients.

He is asking for financial help with the field partner Interactuar to buy a broad variety of vegetables, and thus to stock up and sell more food.

His dream is to have a store to be able to sell his food calmly and comfortably.

Lend and contribute today!

loans.use: to buy a broad variety of vegetables, and thus to stock up and sell more food.

loans.name: Sabina

texts.es:
La socia  pertenece al banco comunal LLAPALLANCHIS LLANKASUNCHIS,el banco está ubicado en la provincia de Paucartambo.
La  socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose al negocio de restaurante, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose  a su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día  a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicito el crédito para la compra de arroz, carnes, aceite entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Sabina is a member of the communal bank LLAPALLANCHIS LLANKASUNCHIS, which is located in the province of Paucartambo. She works in her own restaurant daily. She has been doing this for quite some time, and it is going well for her because of the effort she puts into it everyday. She wishes to continue working to be able to support her family this way.

The member is requesting the loan to buy rice, meat, oil, and so on.

The member is grateful for the granted loan and is committed to repay all her installments on time.

loans.use: to buy rice, meat, oil, and so on.

loans.name: Jose

texts.es:
Jose está casado, es de la ciudad de Encarnación, tiene 3 hijos, por quienes está luchando para poder serles de ejemplo y también para poder ayudarles.
Está estudiando la carrera de administración de empresas, y con ello quiere ir abriéndose camino y así cumplir con su meta de ser alguien en la vida.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera y con ello poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por esta oportunidad que tiene de seguir creciendo
texts.en:
Jose is married and lives in the city of Encarnación. He as three children, he is working hard to be an example to them, and to be able to support them.

He is studying business administration because he wants to open new paths, and achieve his goal to be somebody in life.

He is requesting this loan to be able to pay for his tuition fees and to continue studying the way he does. He is thankful for getting this opportunity to grow further.

loans.use: to pay for his university tuition fees.

loans.name: Jesus Antonio

texts.es:
Con su gran forma de trabajar y atender a sus clientes, Jesús se ha ganado el cariño y corazón de los habitantes del municipio de San Rafael.

En su negocio de venta de salpicón y solterita, intenta ganarse la vida y obtener los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de sus gastos.
e
Pide un apoyo económico para realizar la compra al por mayor de frutas y de empaques para sus productos.

De esta forma tendrá una mejor oportunidad de progreso pues tendrá un inventario mas surtido.
texts.en:
Jesús has won the affection and the heart of the residents of the town of San Rafael because of the way he works and serves his customers.  In his business selling salad and "solterita" [fried pastries], his goal is to earn a living and the income he needs to cover his expenses.

He's requesting financial support to make a wholesale purchase of fruit and packaging for his products.  That way he'll have a better opportunity for progress because he'll have a better stocked inventory.

loans.use: to make a wholesale purchase of fruit and packaging for his products

loans.name: Muhammad

texts.en:
Muhammad is a 31-year-old married man from Dier El Balah city. He is the father of two sons. Muhammad works as an employee in the public sector where he earns a low and unstable income. He wants to improve his family's living conditions, but his income is barely covering all the family's needs.

Muhammad took a Murabaha loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a solar system for heating water for his house. This will help him to provide hot water without using electricity. Muhammad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for his house.

loans.name: Feliciano

texts.es:
El socio Feliciano continua dedicando al negocio de venta de fertilizantes, él socio lleva años dedicándose  a su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día  a su negocio, él socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso, siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante  a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para comprar fertilizantes entre otros.
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member, Feliciano, still earns a living in his business selling fertilizer.  He has had this business for a long time and it's going well for him thanks to the effort he puts into it every day.  He's a very responsible and diligent person, which is how he gets his family ahead.

Feliciano's requesting the loan to buy fertilizer and other supplies.

He's happy about the loan and promises to make his payments.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other supplies

loans.name: Lynie

texts.en:
Lynie is 54 years old and resides in Disud, Sindangan. She is married and she joined PMPC in order to access its programs and services. 

Recently, Lynie took a new loan in the amount of PHP 35,000 for additional working capital for her existing business to buy a variety of commodities and food products that she sells in the local community.

loans.use: to buy variety of commodities and food products to resell

loans.name: Ma. Elena

texts.en:
Ma. Elena is married and she works hard to support her family. She has a peanut butter making business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from frozen foods. 

Ma. Elena is borrowing PHP 7,000 through NWTF to purchase peanuts, sugar, oil, and other ingredients for her peanut butter making business. She has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. Ma. Elena hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase peanuts, sugar, oil, and other ingredients.

loans.name: Yamile Yanine

texts.es:
Yamile a sus 43 años de edad, debido a la falta de oportunidades de empleo y por necesidad económica se motiva a independizarse y conseguir ingresos por su cuenta, por eso desea iniciar un negocio de tienda de abarrotes que estará ubicado en su casa.

Ella desea ofrecer en su negocio todo tipo de abarrotes, granos, golosinas, carnes frias, bebidas, enlatados, entre otros, con esto espera conseguir los recursos necesarios para satisfacer sus necesidades básicas. 

Yamile es una señora trabajadora, pujante, emprendedora, solicita el crédito como apoyo para invertirlo en la compra de surtido de este tipo de productos para tener disponibilidad y variedad de productos que satisfagan los gustos de todos sus clientes, de esta forma podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida y bienestar.

Gracias al apoyo de la Corporación Interactuar y a los prestamistas de Kiva podrá montar este negocio y conseguirá ser independiente.
texts.en:
Yamile, at 43 years of age, due to the lack of employment opportunities and because of economic need, is motivated to become independent and get an income of her own. This is why she wants to start a grocery store which will be located in her home.
She wants to offer all sorts of products in her store, such as grains, candy, cold meat, drinks, and canned foods, among others. With this, she hopes to get the necessary resources to satisfy her basic needs. 
Yamile is a hard-worker and entrepreneurial. She asks for the loan as support to invest in the purchase of stock of this type of products, to have availability and variety of products that will satisfy the tastes of all her clients. In this way, she will be able to have a better quality of life and well-being.
Thanks to the help of Corporacion Interactuar and Kiva lenders, she will be able to open this business and manage to become independent.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of food products to have availability and variety to satisfy all her clients' tastes.

loans.name: Ruel

texts.en:
Ruel is a trisykad (a bicycle with side car) driver from Ronda, Cebu. Trisykads are used to transport passengers, especially students, in some villages. Ruel is 43 years old and, for five years now, this has been his livelihood that supports him and his ten-year-old daughter. 

Ruel is asking for a loan to buy another trisykad that he can rent out to other drivers to earn additional income. In this way, he plans to expand his business to earn more. Ruel works hard to give his daughter a good future. His income will be used for food and school fees.

loans.use: to buy another trisykad (a bicycle with a sidecar)

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
Norma owns a sari-sari (variety) store in Ozamiz City. Being a microfinance member of PMPC, she diligently pays off all her obligations from the earnings of her shop. 

Recently, Norma applied for a loan to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items. She is adding an extension shop in a nearby barangay, and she wishes to earn more doing this type of business.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Lita

texts.en:
Lita hoped for good fortune when she joined the microfinance group Paglaum MPC. She decided to give it a try after she learned she could request financial assistance for her chosen business. Lita has maintained her membership in good standing without a default to this day. She has taken several loans and all were repaid in a timely manner. 

Recently, she requested a loan to purchase additional piglets that she can feed and sell to pay for bags of feed and animal vitamins. Lita wishes to continue to manage her business more effectively with the support of her family. Someday, she hopes to repair her house and to provide her family a safe and decent living.

loans.use: to purchase additional piglets that she can feed and sell to pay for bags of feed and animal vitamins

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase motorcycle spare parts for repair and maintenance of his motorcycle so he can serve more customers, which he hopes will enable him to generate more income.

loans.name: Bevirly

texts.en:
Bevirly has always dreamed of opening and managing her own retail store to support her needs. Bevirly is married with two school-age children. The family lives in Salug, Zamboanga del Norte, in the Philippines. 

She applied for a loan to restock her store with basic inventory items like sugar, oil, milk and canned goods. She is now on her way to repaying the loan with her new profits, and supporting her children.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic inventory items like sugar, oil, milk and canned goods

location.town: Liloy- Caracol, Salug, Zamboanga del Norte

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase certified seeds, fertilizer and herbicides to spray plants to enhance their health so as to increase productivity .

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase motorcycle spare parts for repair and maintenance so as to meet client needs in his transport services.

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es:
Maria es una persona muy simpática y siempre tiene una sonrisa para los clientes que visitan su tienda de abarrotes en zona rural del municipio de Caparrapi.
Gracias a su carisma y buen humor se ha podido ganar el corazón y reconocimiento de las personas del sector que siempre prefieren visitar su tienda para adquirir sus productos.

Todos los días trabaja para darles una buena calidad de vida  a sus 2 hijos por los cuales aspira a darles un excelente futuro.
Trabaja sola durante 8 horas todos los días.

Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de surtido de productos de la canasta familiar como granos, abarrotes, golosinas, bebidas, entre otros y de esta forma darle un impulso significativo a su negocio.

Ella guarda la esperanza de poder continuar con su negocio y así seguir impactando la vida de sus clientes a través de su buen servicio.
texts.en:
María is a very friendly person and always has a smile for the customers who visit her grocery store in the rural zone of Caparrapi municipality. Thanks to her charisma and good humor, she has been able to win the hearts and recognition of the people in the sector who always prefer to visit her store to buy her products.

Every day she works to give a good quality of life to her 2 children, to whom she aspires to give an excellent future. She works alone for 8 hours every day.

She is currently requesting a loan for the purchase of a range of family staple products such as grains, groceries, sweets, drinks, among others, and this way give a significant boost to her business. She hopes to be able to continue her business and thus further impacting her customers' lives through her good service.

loans.use: to buy a range of family staple products such as grains, groceries, sweets, drinks, among others.

loans.name: Sajida

texts.en:
Sajida is a 51-year-old lady who resides in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is an active borrower with BRAC Pakistan. Sajida is the mother of three daughters and five sons. Her husband has had his own business farming cattle for the past 20 years and he is responsible for fulfilling the needs of his entire family and managing the household.

Sajida's husband wants to purchase animals for his business, but due to financial constraints he has been unable to purchase these cattle. Therefore Sajida has requested a loan from Kiva field partner BRAC Pakistan. This loan will enable her husband to buy cattle to fulfill the needs of his business and it will also help him earn maximum profits from his business.

For this financial assistance Sajida is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy cattle for her husband's business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing of various colors for her husband's clothing shop.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen is a cattle farmer who also deals in crop production for additional income in Kasese, Uganda. Stephen has a dream of being the most successful supplier of beef cows in the area, and also to trade across the whole nation. 

He is 34 years old, a hardworking married man charged with a responsibility of looking after eight children, that is four dependents and four of his biological children. 

With this loan, Stephen will buy cows for fattening to sell.

loans.use: to buy cows for fattening to sell.

loans.name: Naseem

texts.en:
Naseem, 38, is an active borrower with BRAC Pakistan, who resides in Rawalpindi, Pakistan with her spouse and two children. Her husband has been running his own tailoring shop in the local market for 20 years. Her husband is the only person responsible for fulfilling the needs of entire family.

Naseem's husband needs to buy different types of tailoring accessories, e.g. pieces of clothes, needles and sewing machine accessories. But due to some financial constraints, her husband is not in a suitable condition to buy these items for his business. Therefore, Naseem has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan. With the help of this loan, she will financially assist her husband to buy these tailoring accessories to fulfill his business needs so that he can earn more income.

For this financial assistance, Naseem is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to fund her husband's tailoring business

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en:
Rosalina has agricultural land in Oroquieta. She and her husband are both farmers. They plant corn, vegetables, and other crops. Rosalina makes good earnings doing this type of work, which is the primary source of income for her family. To expand her resources, Rosalina makes it a point to prepare the land well for planting dwarf coconut and banana seedlings, as well as root crops. This preparation gives her the maximum yield and generates a good income.

Recently, Rosalina needed an amount to pay for clearing land, digging the soil, and planting seedlings, which she borrowed from Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative.

Rosalina wishes to sustain her business and to provide her family with a better standard of living.

loans.use: to pay for clearing land, digging the soil, and planting seedlings

location.town: Oroquieta-Tuyabang Alto Oroquieta City Misamis Occ

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
For two years now, Marilyn  has been running a sari-sari (variety) store. She sells various merchandise like pouch soy sauce, soap, mosquito repellant, biscuits, shampoo, seasonings, coffee, noodles and assorted canned goods. She is married with four dependents. Her oldest child is 14 and the youngest is 2.

She is asking for a loan  to purchase soft drinks and groceries. This will boost the store contents and enable her to attract more buyers to shop. In this way, she could now able to roll her capital and invest in any possible business venture. Thus she could now support the welfare of her growing children and cater to their respective needs.

Marilyn hopes that she will be productive in handling her sari-sari (variety) store business to become sustainable in the years to come.

loans.use: to purchase soft drinks and groceries

loans.name: Shiela May

texts.en:
Sheila is a young woman from Badian, Cebu.  She is married with two boys, ages 1 and 4. Sheila relies on her buy-and-sell business for a living. She buys bananas from farmers and sells them to local fruit vendors. 

She is asking a loan of PHP10,000 for additional capital so she can supply more bananas to her buyers. 

She will save for the future of her children and plans to have other business ventures to improve her family’s life.

loans.use: to buy more bananas

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy animal feed for her livestock

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is a 27-year-old married man with one child living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He has a business of motorcycle transport and at the same time does farming. James faces challenges of competition and poor roads that hinder transportation when heavy rains make the roads impassible. Besides that, he has future prospects of having another motorcycle also for transport in order to generate more income.

James needs a loan to buy a new motorcycle.

loans.use: to buy a new motorcycle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow for milk production so as to increase the number of liters of milk he can supply to his clients daily.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy farm inputs such as seeds and fertilizer for use on his farm in the hope this will enable him to get more farm produce to sell.

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles used the previous loan to buy fresh foods for selling, and has continued with the same business plus motorcycle transport that adds him more income. He started these businesses with a hope of earning income to pay school fees for his children. He has future plans of expanding his business to new areas and establishing a grocery shop. 

Charles is requesting a loan to buy fresh foods for selling.

loans.use: to buy fresh foods for selling.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria continua poniendo su mejor esfuerzo para poder terminar sus estudios, sigue con su carrera de administración de empresas, comenta que este sería su tercer préstamo con kiva, lo cual le será de mucha ayuda para poder seguir con sus estudios.
Hoy pide nuevamente este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y con ello poder seguir luchando por ser una buena profesional.
texts.en:
Maria continues to put forth her best effort to be able to finish her education. She is still in her business administration program. She says that this will be her third Kiva loan, which will be a great help to be able to continue with her studies. 

Today, she asks for another loan to be able to pay her program fees, and with this be able to continue struggling to be a good professional.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Delia

texts.es:
Delia vive en la ciudad de Villarrica, es una persona muy sacrificada, que a la vez que estudia también trabaja por salir adelante, esta estudiando la carrera de ciencias en la educación, con lo que quiere poder ayudar a las demás personas que el igual que ella quieren aprender para salir adelante.
Ella se esfuerza y pone todo lo mejor de si. Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y con ello poder cumplir con su anhelo de ser una buena profesional.
texts.en:
Delia lives in the city of Villarrica. She is a very self-sacrificing person, who while studying also works so as to get ahead. She is studying for a degree in science education, with which she wants to be able to help other people and also she wants to learn to get ahead.

She works hard and puts her best self into it. She asks for this loan to be able to pay her program fees and with that be able to achieve her desire which is to be a good professional.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Carlos Antonio

texts.es: Carlos de 45 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida, el se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de dedicarse a las siembras y eso le ha dado la experiencia necesaria para poder obtener una buena cosecha, inicio con capital propio, vende su producto en todas las zonas aledañas de donde el reside, Carlos  es un hombre muy  trabajador siembre esta buscando la manera de salir adelante, por eso decidió en solicitar a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar herbicida, abonos, controles de plagas,  etc. y asi poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Carlos is 45 years old and lives in his own home with his life partner. He makes a living growing the basic grains corn and beans. He has several years devoted to this activity and it has given him the necessary experience to obtain a good harvest. He started with his own savings. He sells his products in all the surrounding areas around where he resides. 

Carlos is a hardworking man, always looking for a way to be successful. For this reason, he decided to ask for a loan through INTEGRAL that would allow for him to purchase herbicide, fertilizer, pest control, etc. so that he can have better income and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy herbicide, fertilizer, pest control, etc.

loans.name: Liz

texts.es:
Liz esta estudiando arduamente la carrera de enfermería, la cual ella misma eligió y en la cual esta poniendo todo lo mejor de si. Comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso en poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, lo cual le ha sido de mucha ayuda.
Hoy nuevamente pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por esta nueva oportunidad que recibe, que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Liz is studying very hard for her nursing degree, which she chose herself and into which she is putting all her best self. She says that she used her previous loan to pay for program fees, which was a great help. 

Today, she is asking for another loan to be able to pay her program fees, and in this way be able to continue with her studies as she has been doing. 

She is grateful for this new opportunity that she is getting, which will be a great help.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria es de la ciudad de Paraguarí, continua con sus estudios en licenciatura en farmacia, ella es una persona muy emprendedora, que pone todo de si para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de su familia. Comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso en pagar las cuotas de su carrera y lo que le fue muy útil.
Maria pide nuevamente este préstamo para poder ´pagar sus cuotas, y con ello poder seguir con sus estudios, luchando arduamente.
texts.en:
Maria is from the city of Paraguarí. She continues to study for her pharmacy degree. She is a very enterprising person who puts her whole self into being able to improve her living conditions and those of her family. She says that she used the previous loan to pay for the program fees and that it was very helpful. 

Maria asks for another loan to be able to pay her fees and, with this, be able to continue with her studies, struggling arduously.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Marina

texts.es:
Marina es una persona muy emprendedora, sigue estudiando su carrera de enfermería, ella esta poniendo su mejor esfuerzo para poder ser alguien en la vida, y abrirse camino en el mundo profesional. Ella comenta que este sería su tercer préstamo con kiva, y su anterior préstamo lo uso en poder pagar las cuotas, lo cual le fue de mucha ayuda.
Hoy pide nuevamente este préstamo para poder cubrir sus gastos de manutención, y también para poder comprar sus útiles de universidad.
texts.en:
Marina is a very enterprising person. She continues studying in her nursing program. She is putting forth her best effort to be able to be someone in life and make her way in the professional world. She says that this will be her third loan with Kiva and she used her previous loan to be able to pay the fees, which was a great help.

Today, she is asking for another loan to be able to pay living expenses and also to purchase university supplies.

loans.use: to cover living expenses and purchase university supplies.

loans.name: Antonia Faustina

texts.es: Doña Antonia de 51 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos, ella se dedica  al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y eso le ha dado la suficiente experiencia para poder obtener siempre las mejores cosechas, el terreno donde cultiva es muy adecuado para la siembra y se encuentra cercano a su vivienda, comercia en todas las zonas aledañas y se ha hecho de clientela muy valiosa, ella es una mujer decidida y trabajadora, en esta época de siembra busca aumentar la producción pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar insumos necesarios como herbicida, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía y asi seguir con su trabajo para darle a su familia seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Antonia is 51 years old and she lives in her own home with her two children. She earns a living growing corn and beans.

She has been working in farming for several years and gained sufficient experience to consistently obtain the best crop yields. The land that she cultivates is very suitable for planting and is close to her home. She sells in the neighboring zones and has retained a  valuable clientele. 

Antonia is a determined woman who works hard. For this planting season, she is looking to increase production, but she does not have enough capital, and this is why she is applying for a loan through Integral. She will buy inputs including herbicides, compost, pest control products, and more, needed to improve the land shown in the photo above. This will allow her to continue with her work so that she can provide financial security for her family.

loans.use: to buy herbicides, compost, pest control products, and more to improve the land that she cultivates.

loans.name: Benita

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “IMASUMAC I”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Benita; la socia continua dedicándose al  negocio de venta de golosinas, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a  este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día  a su negocio, la socia continua vendiendo caramelos, chicles, chupetes y galletas, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar galletas, caramelos entre otros.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Imasumac I communal bank. The bank is located in Cusco district, which is part of Cusco province and Cusco department.

The member is Benita, she continues working in her candy business. She has been working in this business for a good while and it is going well for her, thanks to the diligence that she puts into her business each day. The member continues selling candies, gum, lollipops and cookies. The member wants to be able to continue working so that, in this way, she can continue supporting her family.

The member asks for the loan to purchase cookies, candies, and more.

loans.use: to purchase cookies, sweets, and more.

loans.name: Mery Ingrid

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal DULCE NOMBRE DE JESUS, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia sigue dedicándose al negocio de brosteria, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose  a su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día  a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de pollos entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Dulce Nombre de Jesus communal bank. The bank is located in Cusco district and Cusco department.

The member continues to work in her rotisserie business. She has been working in her business for a good while, which is going well for her thanks to the determination she puts into her business each day. The member wants to be able to continue working so that in this way to continue supporting her family.

The member asks for the loan to purchase chickens and more.

The member is grateful for the granted loan and promises to make the established payments.

loans.use: to purchase chickens and more.

loans.name: Hugo Ernesto

texts.es: Hugo de 33 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida, el se dedica desde hace 5 años a la agricultura siembra maíz y maicillo, es un hombre muy trabajador que siempre esta buscando la manera de poder salir adelante y gracias a su trabajo es como durante este tiempo ha llevado el sustento a su hogar, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de insumos agrícolas como semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y asi continuar con su trabajo y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Hugo, 33, lives in his own house with his life partner.  He has earned a living in agriculture growing corn and sorghum for five years.  He's a very hardworking man who's always looking for ways to get ahead.  Thanks to his job he has managed to support his household during this time.

He's requesting a loan to buy agricultural inputs such as seeds, fertilizer, soil amendments, pest control, and the like so he can keep on working and giving his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs such as seeds, fertilizer, soil amendments, pest control, etc.

loans.name: Agapita

texts.es:
Agapita es una persona de recursos limitados, se desempeña como confeccionista, su deseo es ser una profesional exitosa para mejorar su calidad de vida, es por ello que está estudiando la carrera de administración de empresas para poder abrirse camino.
Ella es una persona muy luchadora, y pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera.
texts.en: Agapita is a person with limited resources. She works In the manufacture and sales of clothing. Her dream is to be a successful professional in order to improve her quality of life. That is why she is studying business administration so she can get ahead. She is a very tenacious person and is requesting this loan to pay school fees for her degree.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Natalia

texts.es:
Natalia esta estudiando la carrera de economía, por medio de sus estudios quiere abrirse camino y ser una profesional reconocida, ella comenta que su anterior préstamo de kiva le fue de mucha ayuda con sus estudios, y que le permitió continuar luchando por su meta.
Natalia pide hoy este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y con ello seguir luchando por ser esa profesional exitosa que tanto anhela. Agradece por esta nueva oportunidad que recibe.
texts.en:
Natalia is an economics major. Through these studies she hopes to forge a path ahead and become a renowned professional. She says that her previous loan from Kiva was very helpful for her studies and allowed her to continue striving toward her goal. 
 
Natalia is requesting this loan to pay the costs of her degree so she can continue striving to be the successful professional she so desires to be. She is grateful for this new opportunity.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Edwin Ernesto

texts.es: Edwin de 42 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, es un hombre trabajador dedicado a su familia, toda su vida ha trabajado en el campo, en el cultivo de maíz y frijoles. Como todo campesino cada año realiza la misma actividad: prepara la tierra, siembra la semilla, saca la cosecha y luego la pone a la venta de esta forma es como logra sacar los ingresos para llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar, el esta solicitando un crédito para invertir en abono, fertilizantes, semillas, etc. para el cultivo de maíz y frijoles asi poder tener una cosecha abundante ya que es la única forma que conoce de ganarse la vida y asi seguir llevando el sustento a su hogar.
texts.en: Edwin, 42 years old, lives with his family in a house he owns. He is a hard-working man who is dedicated to his family. He has worked his whole life in the countryside, growing corn and beans. Like all rural people, every year he does the same work: he prepares the land, plants the seeds, takes in the harvest and then sells it, and this is the way that he manages to get the income to bring the daily bread to his home. He is asking for a loan to invest in compost, fertilizer, seeds, etc. for the corn and bean crops, so to be able to have an abundant harvest since this is the only way that he knows to earn a living and, so, to continue bringing sustenance to his home.

loans.use: to purchase compost, fertilizer, seeds, etc.

loans.name: Balvina

texts.es:
La Señora Balvina es de la ciudad de Itá, tiene una despensa que con sacrificio y esfuerzo ha podido mejorar y crecer, ella es una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora, que con sacrificio ha salido adelante.
Balvina comenta que su día empieza todos los días desde muy temprano, y que con su negocio pudo sacar adelante a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar insumos para su despensa, como ser verduras, frutas, bebidas, panificados y otros. Agradece por esta oportunidad de mejorar.
texts.en:
Balvina is from the city of Itá. She has a store that she has been able to improve and grow with much sacrifice and hard work. She is a very hard working and enterprising woman, who has been able to get ahead with sacrifice. 

Balvina says that her every day she starts very early, and that with her business she has been able to get her family ahead. She is asking for this loan to buy inventory for her store, such as vegetables, fruit, beverages, bread products and more. She is grateful for the opportunity to improve.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, fruits, beverages, bread products and other inventory.

loans.name: Señor De Pucca Mocco Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SEÑOR DE PUCCA MOCCO, el banco está ubicado en el departamento de Cusco.
La socia Alejandrina  tiene 46 años de edad y es conviviente, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias  dedicándose al negocio al negocio de restaurante, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia se siente agradecida por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma  salir adelante.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de arroz, aceite entre otros.
Los demás socios se sienten agradecidos por el crédito y se comprometen a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the SEÑOR DE PUCCA MOCCO communal bank. The bank is located in the department of Cuzco.  

Alejandrina is 46 years old and in a common law marriage. She alternates her  daily activities with working at her restaurant business.  She has had her business for a long time and it is going well for her because of the hard work she puts into her business every day. She is grateful for the loan and committed to making her payments. She wants to be able to keep working in this way in order to get ahead. 

She is asking for the loan to buy rice and oil, among others. The other members are grateful for the loan and committed to making their payments.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil, and more.

loans.name: Madhugiri Millet Growers Association Group

texts.en:
Kamanna is 56 years old, married and has two sons. He is a featured borrower of Madhugiri Millet Growers Association. This group consist of 15 additional members. Kamanna and his group members operate in Tumkur district of Karnataka. 

He sensed the awareness arising among south Indian people for the uptake of minor millets and he urged the people in his vicinity, who are marginal farmers, to cultivate millets. Fortunately they got good income by selling it, especially with less rainfall. People from nearby villages also showed their willingness to form a group and sell their crops jointly. 

They now wish to install a processing center in their village, so that they can sell the processed minor millets as whole grain, which will fetch more income than unprocessed grains. With the loan they will buy machines for minor millets dehusking and packaging. Help them to improve their lives.

loans.use: To obtain processing machines for minor millets dehusking and packaging.

loans.name: Evelia

texts.es: Evelia tiene 45 años y vive con su esposo e hijo. Además de su empleo administrativo, el año pasado inició un negocio vendiendo pollo frito y empanizado. Evelia utiliza una receta secreta, que le ha ayudado a tener éxito en toda la región. actualmente solo ofrece el servicio para llevar, pero gracias a todo lo que han logrado, planea abrir un pequeño local para que los clientes puedan disfrutar del pollo en el mismo lugar en el que se prepara. Evelia está solicitando un préstamo por MXN 10,000 para comprar mesas y sillas para ofrecer un mejor servicio. Es una mujer muy trabajadora y le gusta ganarse su propio dinero para ser independiente. Su mayor sueño es tener estabilidad financiera para darle las mejores condiciones de vida a su familia. A Evelia no le dan miedo los retos que pueda enfrentar en su camino hacia el éxito. Con este préstamo ella será capaz de incrementar significativamente sus ganancias, lo que le permitirá realizar pagos en tiempo y forma en su primer préstamo con Konfío.
texts.en: Evelia is 45 years old and lives with her husband and child. In addition to her administrative job, last year she opened her own business selling fried and breaded chicken. Evelia uses a secret recipe, which has helped her to have success in the whole region. Currently she only offers the service as take out, but thanks to all that she has managed, she plans to open a small retail space for her customers to enjoy the chicken in the same place where she prepares it. Evelia is asking for a loan of 10,000 MXN to purchase tables and chairs to offer better service. She is a very hard-working woman and she likes to earn her own money to be independent. Her greatest dream is to have financial stability to give her family better living conditions. Evelia is not scared of challenges that she could confront on her path to success. With this loan, she will be able to significantly increase her earnings, which will allow her to make timely and correct payments on her first loan with Konfío.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients, tables, and chairs.

loans.name: Kuña Guapa Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Kuña Guapa está en su ciclo número 9 del programa de comité de mujeres, son 18 mujeres capaces que quieren esforzarse para poder ayudar a sus familias, y por medio de la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza poder ir superándose cada día.
La Sra. Nancy solicita  este préstamo para invertir en su negocio personal que es la venta de todo tipo de prendas de vestir y también de calzados varios, para poder comprar los mismos. Comenta que por medio de su trabajo tiene los medios necesarios para poder ayudar a sus seres queridos y darles todo lo que ella no pudo tener. Agradece también por la oportunidad que recibe de poder mejorar su vida.
Comenta también que tiene el deseo de poder superarse y cada día crecer por sus seres queridos.
texts.en:
The group called Kuña Guapa is in its 9th loan cycle in the women's committee program. They are 18 capable women who want to work hard to be able to help their families, and through the poverty elimination tool, be able to improve themselves each day. 

Nancy asks for this loan to invest in her personal business which is the sale of all sorts of clothing and also a variety of footwear, to be able to purchase these.  She says that, through her work, she has the means necessary to be able to help her loved ones and give them everything that she wasn't able to have. She is also grateful for the opportunity that she is getting to be able to improve her life.

She also says that she has the desire to be able to improve herself and grow every day for her loved ones.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of clothing and footwear to sell.

loans.name: 8 De Diciembre Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado 8 de Diciembre está en su ciclo número 3 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan para salir adelante.-
La Sra. Sady, pide este préstamo para usarlo en la compra de hojas, papel fotográfico y cámara digital para ofrecer más servicios en su negocio  ya que ella se dedica a hacer fotocopias y también a la venta de fotos tipo carnet. Es una mujer muy trabajadora que viene abriéndose camino con su esfuerzo y sacrificio.
Ella agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder crecer y mejorar cada día para poder ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
The group called 8 de Diciembre is in its third loan cycle in the women's committee program where they all work and help each other to get ahead. Sady asks for this loan to use it to purchase paper, photographic paper, and a digital camera to offer more services in her business since she works making copies and also selling ID photos. She is a very hard-working woman who is making her way with effort and sacrifice.

She is grateful for this opportunity that she is getting to be able to grow and improve each day to be able to help her family.

loans.use: to purchase paper, photographic paper, and a digital camera.

loans.name: Kuña Guapa 3 Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado kuña Guapa 3 está en su ciclo número 4 del programa de comité de mujeres, están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza para poder conocer la situación de vida de cada una de ellas y conforme a ello poder esforzarse por superar su situación de pobreza.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra.  Dionisia es modista quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, lo que indica que está en una situación de pobreza extrema, pero es consciente que debe seguir esforzándose por salir adelante. A través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y la aplicaciones de los comportamientos vitales de una mujer exitosa, ella se encuentra mejorando su situación de pobreza, pero igualmente está consciente de que este trabajo y esfuerzo que está haciendo debe ser continuo y permanente para lograr un éxito total.
La Sra. Dionisia solicita de este préstamo para la compra de Tela, hilos y agujas, y otros, lo que le ayudará  a la misma a obtener más producción y más venta el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The group called Kuña Guapa 3 is in its fourth loan cycle in the women's committee program. They are completing the poverty elimination questionnaire to be able to know the life situation of each one of them and, according to that, be able to work to overcome their poverty situation. 

One of the members is Dionisia. She is a clothing designer who, in her last questionnaire, showed a poverty level within level one, which indicates that she is in a situation of extreme poverty, but she is aware that she needs to continue working hard to get ahead. Through this effort and continuous work, and the application of the key behaviors of a successful woman, she is improving her poverty situation, but she is equally aware that this work and effort that she is doing should be continuous and permanent to arrive at total success. 

Dionisia asks for this loan to purchase fabric, thread, needles, and more, which will help her to get more production and more sales, which will help her to increase her income.

loans.use: to purchase fabric, thread, needles and other supplies.

loans.name: La Esperanza Group

texts.es:
El grupo La Esperanza es un grupo nuevo, donde las 18 integrantes están con muchas expectativas de poder mejorar sus vidas y las de su familia por medio del programa de eliminación de la pobreza.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Natalia quien a través del esfuerzo y por  medio de la venta de prendas que hace tiene los medios para poder ayudar a su familia y darles una vida digna y sin privaciones como las que ella tuvo que atravesar. Natalia es una mujer que no teme al trabajo, y es por ello que pone todo su esfuerzo siempre.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de prendas varias para la venta, y de esa forma poder seguir luchando para mejorar cada día.
texts.en:
The La Esperanza group is a new group with 18 members who have a lot of expectations to be able to improve their  and their families' lives through the poverty elimination program. 

One of the members is Natalia. Through hard work and by selling items of clothing she has the means of helping her family and giving them a dignified life that lacks for nothing, unlike what she had to go through. Natalia is a woman who is not afraid of work and that is why she always puts all of her effort into everything. 

She is asking for this loan to invest in buying items of clothing to sell. This way, she can continue fighting to improve every day.

loans.use: to buy various items of clothing to sell.

loans.name: Perlita

texts.en:
Perlita is 63 years old and is very responsible with her household obligations since she has always been known to provide the best for her family. She currently lives with five children. She is a farmer who plants corn and beans.

Perlita wants to increase sales. Consequently, she has requested a loan that will enable her to purchase seeds, compost and fertilizer, among other items, so that she can continue to put bread on the table in her home.

loans.use: to buy seeds, compost and fertilizer.

loans.name: Ayesha

texts.en:
Ayesha is a 28-year-old woman. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan, with her four children. Her husband has been working in a public sector organization for many years, and he is responsible to fulfill the needs of the family. 

Ayesha is also providing sewing services and earning income to contribute with her husband to manage the household.
 
She needs different kinds of goods such as needles, threads, pieces of cloth, machine oil, etc. for her business purpose, but due to insufficient financial means, she is unable to purchase these accessories. Therefore she has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan. This loan will enable her to purchase these above accessories and enable her to increase her monthly sales and profit by providing better sewing services.

Ayesha is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to increase her tailoring business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy animal feeds.

loans.name: Silvia

texts.es:
La Sra.  Silvia es  ama de casa, prepara detergentes que comercializa en la zona de la ciudad de  Carapeguá y alrededores. Es una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora que con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio con ayuda de su marido pudieron darles una niñez tranquila a sus hijos.
Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora que quiere seguir con su trabajo para poder dar a sus seres queridos una vida digna y sin privaciones. Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de productos para la elaboración de detergentes para la venta.
texts.en:
Silvia is a housewife. She makes detergents that she sells in the zone of Carapeguá city and the surrounding areas. She is a very hard-working person and determined who, with a lot of effort and sacrifice, and with the help of her husband, was able to provide a peaceful childhood to their children.

She is a very hard-working woman who wants to continue with her work to be able to give her loved ones a dignified life without want. She asks for this loan to be able to invest it in the purchase of products to make detergents to sell.

loans.use: to purchase products to make detergents.

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas De San Nicolas Group

texts.es:
El grupo Mujeres Unidas de San Nicolas  está en su ciclo número 2º del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas están dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, donde se destaca la Sra. Ydelvina, quien tiene una despensa y también se dedica a la venta de comidas.
Ydelvina comenta todos los días trabaja desde muy temprano, y que por medio de su trabajo tiene los medios para poder ayudar a su familia y a sus seres queridos.
Ella es una persona muy trabajadora, y pide este prestamos para poder invertirlo en la compra de productos para poder surtir su despensa con verduras, frutas, lácteos, panificados y demás. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder crecer y mejorar.
texts.en:
The Mujeres Unidas de San Nicolas group is in its second loan cycle in the women's committee program where they are all in the poverty elimination program, where Ydelvina stands out. She has a general store and also works selling food. 

Ydelvina says that she works every day from very early in the morning, and that through her work she has the means to be able to help her family and her loved ones.

She is a very hard-working person and asks for this loan to be able to invest it in the purchase of products to be able to stock her store with vegetables, fruit, dairy products, baked goods, and more. She is grateful for the opportunity that she is getting to be able to grow and improve.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables, fruits, dairy products, baked goods, and others to stock her store.

loans.name: Shamim

texts.en:
Shamim used the previous loan to buy food like matooke and cassava for her restaurant. 

She is still in the same business of owning a restaurant, and she has a motorcycle transportation business for additional income. She faces challenges of defaulters and weather changes. However, she hopes to start up another income-generating activity like poultry farming to be assured of constant income. 

Shamim needs a loan to buy food like matooke, and items to use in her restaurant like sauce pans, cups and tables.

loans.use: to buy food like matooke and items to use in her restaurant like sauce pans, cups and tables.

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es:
La socia  pertenece al banco comunal DULCE NOMBRE DE JESUS.
La  socia Paulina alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose al negocio de venta de pasto, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose  a su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día  a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicito el crédito para la compra de pasto entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Dulce Nombre de Jesus communal bank.

The member, Paulina, alternates her daily chores with working selling fodder. The member has been working in her business for a good while, which is going well for her, thanks to the diligence she puts into her business each day. The member wants to be able to continue working so that in this way continue supporting her family.

The member asks for the loan to purchase fodder among other things.

The member is grateful for the granted loan and promises to make the established payments.

loans.use: to purchase fodder and more.

loans.name: Feliciana

texts.en:
After learning about Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) and hearing about all the the benefits and financial services, Feliciana never hesitated to become a member. 

She tried her luck by operating a business focused on her farming activities. Feliciana feels she owes her luck to the cooperative for having trusted her with the money she used as capital. 

She is now borrowing another loan to pay for seedlings and compost. This will give her farming income a big boost. Feliciana is seeking better business opportunities and would love to be in the position to help others.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and compost.

loans.name: Azra

texts.en:
Azra is 40-year-old woman. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is a responsible mother of four children. 

Her husband is a rickshaw driver by profession. For many days his rickshaw has not been working properly, so he is unable to generate any amount of income. Her husband wants to repair it as soon as possible. However, due to the lack of money, her husband can't cover the cost of repairing the rickshaw. 

Therefore, Azra has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to help her husband to cover the cost of repairing the rickshaw. This will help him to continue his business. Azra is so much thankful to Kiva and BRAC  Pakistan.

loans.use: to repair her husband's rickshaw.

loans.name: Grecilda

texts.en:
Grecilda is hardworking mother of two children.  

She engages in buying and selling to help support her farmer husband in their household expenses.  

She has requested a loan to be used in purchasing additional construction materials for the finishing of their ongoing house construction. 

Grecilda has been a member of PMPC just this year. In the future, Grecilda hopes to expand her buy and sell business and save for family emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase additional construction materials.

loans.name: Boris Cesar

texts.es:
Boris es un hombre de 34 años de edad, vive con su pareja, sin hijos, y su negocio es la fabricación de mermeladas.
Él es emprendedor, independiente, constante, optimista, responsable y muy trabajador. Su negocio lo realiza en la zona ‘villa Salomé’ caracterizada por estar conectada con el resto de la ciudad mediante un camino angosto, el 50 por ciento de la zona cuenta con alcantarillado y agua potable, la otra mitad recibe agua a través de una vertiente. De clima frio y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre -1/16 grados centígrados.
Boris es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello negro corto, baja estatura, complexión física mediana, su lengua materna es el Aymará que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con su pareja que se dedica al mismo negocio. Viven en una casa propiedad de la familia construida de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina y piso de madera que cuenta con energía eléctrica y agua de pozo extraída mediante una bomba eléctrica. Su negocio es la producción de mermeladas de; naranja, de limón, de mandarina, para poder disfrutar de ellas en verano. Las naranjas ecológicas muy jugosas y dulces como de naranja amarga son las más populares. Su sabor es dulce, ácido y amargo al mismo tiempo, con un dejo refrescante, “es muy importante que los cítricos sean siempre de cultivo ecológico. La piel de las naranjas y limones convencionales NO es comestible por su alto contenido en pesticidas y productos químicos…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que las mermeladas comerciales tienen muchísimo azúcar, más del 60% y un montón de ingredientes extraños, la desventaja es la falta de capital de inversión. Su sueño es establecer su negocio como pequeña industria artesanal, él desea realizar la compra de herramientas y equipo para producir mermeladas y así conseguir su licencia sanitaria para ampliar su mercado. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 2 años que realiza esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Boris solicita un préstamo para la compra de herramientas para producir mermelada artesanal y obtener su licencia sanitaria.
texts.en:
Boris is a 34 year old man. He lives with his spouse, with no children. His business is making jams. He is enterprising, independent, stable, optimist, responsible, and very hardworking. He runs his business in an area called ‘Villa Salomé’, characterized by being connected to the rest of the city by a narrow road. Fifty percent of the area has plumbing and potable water. The other half gets water from a well. It has a cold, dry climate with a temperature that varies during the day between -1 to 16 degrees centigrade. 

Boris has dark skin, brown eyes, short black hair, a short stature, and a medium build. His mother tongue is Aymará, which he speaks in his family. He speaks Spanish in the general culture and for business. He shares his life with his spouse, who works at the same business. They lives in a family owned house built from bricks and cement with a metal sheeting roof and a wooden floor. It has electricity and a water well that has an electric pump.  His business is making marmalades from oranges, lemons, and tangerines, to enjoy in summer. Organic oranges are very juicy and sweet and jams like tart orange jam are the most popular. Its flavor is sweet, acid and tart all at the same time, with a refreshing aftertaste. “It is very important that the citrus always be organic. The peels of conventional oranges and lemons are NOT edible due to their high content of pesticides and chemical products." he remarks. The advantage the business has is that commercial marmalades have a lot of sugar, more than 60%, plus a lot of strange ingredients. The disadvantage is a lack of investment capital. His dream is to establish a business as a small artisanal industry. He wants to buy tools and equipment to produce marmalades and thus get his health license to widen his market. This is his first loan sequence with the institution in the two years he has been doing this activity. 

It is for these reasons that Boris is asking for a loan to buy tools to produce artisanal marmalade and to get his health license.

loans.use: to buy tools to make artisanal marmalade and to get his health license.

loans.name: Leonora

texts.en:
Leonora is 44 years old. She is a widow and resident of Liloy, Zamboange del Norte, Philippines. 

Leonora has a food stall near the bus/jeep terminal where she displays and sells food snacks and drinks. 

Leonora joined PMPC in order to obtain financial assistance to expand her business. Now she is applying for 10,000 PHP to buy additional goods for her sari-sari store, particularly basic commodities and raw ingredients for the food and snacks she makes and sells.  

In the future, she wants to own a mini-mart someday, and she will be fully satisfied if she sees her children finish their studies.

loans.use: to buy additional goods for her sari-sari store, particularly basic commodities and raw ingredients for the food and snacks she makes and sells.

loans.name: Judith

texts.en: Judith is 47 years old, a married woman with four children and all go to school in Kasese, Uganda. Judith is very creative and innovative by making juice to sell in the market. Judith hopes to increase the production of juice, however much she is faced with the challenge of limited capital which is hindering her dream. Judith requests a loan to buy packaging materials for her juice.

loans.use: to buy packaging materials for her juice.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy cattle for fattening and selling.

loans.name: Claudia Isabel

texts.es:
Humilde y trabajadora, así es Claudia, una mujer guerrera que ha dedicado gran parte de su vida al cuidado de sus hijos, vive en el municipio de Medellin, donde se gana la vida con la preparación de alimentos variados como almuerzos y desayunos en un pequeño restaurante ubicado en su casa.
Trabaja sola todos los días durante 6 horas.

Sus alimentos son conocidos por los vecinos del sector, quienes visitan su restaurante porque saben que podrá comer de una manera deliciosa.

Claudia ha decidido mejorar su negocio y aumentar sus ventas, por esta razón acude a un préstamo para comprar silletería y un fogón de tres puestos.

Este préstamo le permitirá sacar adelante su negocio para obtener así los ingresos necesarios que le den la oportunidad de continuar sosteniendo a su familia y su negocio.

Apoya a esta mujer con un préstamo y haz realidad sus sueños!
texts.en:
Claudia is humble and hard-working.  She is a fighter, and she has devoted a big part of her life to caring for her children.  She lives in the Medellin municipality.  This is where she earns a living by preparing various foods like lunches and breakfasts in a small restaurant at her house.  She works alone every day for six hours.

Her food is well-known by her neighbors in the area.  They go to her restaurant because they know that they will be able to eat delicious food.

Claudia has decided to improve her business and increase her sales.  This is the reason that she turns to a loan to buy seating and a three burner stove.  This loan will allow her to get ahead in her business so that she can get the income needed to have the chance to continue supporting her family and her business.

Support this woman with a loan and make her dreams come true.

loans.use: to buy seating and a three burner stove.

loans.name: Lina Maria

texts.es:
Lina es de la ciudad del Carmen de Viboral, se dedica al comercio hace 1 años, es soltera, y con la ayuda de su madre se ha abierto camino y hoy día ya es muy conocida en el sector donde ubica su negocio.

Se dedica a la venta de mochilas artesanales, y con ello puede tener los medios para poder ayudar a su familia. 

Es una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora que quiere salir adelante y tener una vida llena de éxitos y triunfos.

Pide este préstamo para la compra de surtido de este tipo de mochilas y morrales, de manera a que pueda mejorar sus ingresos por medio de su trabajo y puede ir aumentando su negocio de la mejor manera.
texts.en:
Lina is from the city of Carmen de Viboral. She has worked in retail for a year. She is single, and with the help of her mother, good progress has been made and currently she is already well-known in the area where her business is located.

She works selling handmade backpacks, and with the sales she can have the means to be able to help her family. 

She is a very hardworking woman and a fighter who wants to get ahead and have a life full of success and triumphs. 

She is requesting this loan for the purchase of an assortment of this type of backpacks and bags so that she can improve her income by means of her work, and be able to gradually expand her business in the best way.

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of this type of backpacks and bags.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy farm inputs such as seeds and fertilizer for use in her farm; she hopes this will enable her to get more farm produce to sell and she will be able to support her family.

loans.name: Souern

texts.en:
Souern and his wife (both in the picture standing in front of their house) are farmers living with four children. Two of their children have started working already which give less burden to them.

Souern and his wife work hard on their 4 hectares of land day and night to gain a high yield. They always want to find a good power solution to reduce cost and time. However their current energy source (a car battery) is not reliable and they need to spend money every 2 or 3 days to charge it. Moreover, a car battery life span is not long. After just one year, they need to buy a new one. 

After learning the benefits of a solar home system from neighbors, Souern and his wife decided to buy a solar system by applying for a Kiva loan. They believe using a solar home system will reduce cost and save more money. Furthermore, they can live in better conditions with safe and clean energy.

loans.use: to pay for a solar home system

location.town: Taing Khlai Village, Svay Chirj commune, Samaki Me

loans.name: Boqueron 2 Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado “Boqueron 2” está en su 3º ciclo  del programa de comités, este grupo también está dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, donde todas están poniendo lo mejor de sí para ir superando su situación de pobreza.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Dorila, quien se dedica a las ventas, ya que tiene una despensa bien surtida que con mucho sacrificio ha ido sacando adelante. Comenta que está poniendo todo de sí para poder crecer, capacitarse y salir adelante. Pide este préstamo para poder comprar frutas, verduras, aceite, huevos, etc., para poder surtir su negocio y con ello poder dar a sus clientes todo lo que ellos piden.
texts.en:
The group called “Boquerón 2” is in its 3rd cycle of the Communal Bank Program. This group is also in the Elimination of Poverty Program, in which all of the members are doing their best to overcome their situations of poverty. 

One of the members is Señora Dorila, who works in sales, as she has a well-stocked grocery store that she has been moving forward with much sacrifice. She comments that she is doing her best to be able to grow, receive training, and get ahead.  

She is requesting this loan so that she can purchase fruit, vegetables, oil, eggs, etc., so that she can stock her business and thus be able to give her customers all they request.

loans.use: to purchase fruit, vegetables, oil, eggs, etc., in order to stock her grocery store.

loans.name: Willma Nelly

texts.es:
Wilma es una mujer de 55 años de edad, casada, tiene 3 hijos independientes, y su negocio es la fabricación de zapatos.
Ella es emprendedora, fuerte, luchadora, constante, dedicada, organizada, responsable y muy trabajadora. Su negocio lo desarrolla en la zona ‘tembladerani’ caractgerizado por encontrarse el estadio de futbol de un equipo popular. De clima frio y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre -1/16 grados centígrados.
Willma es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello negro largo lo usa trenzado, baja  estatura, complexión física mediana, su forma de vestir es tradicional (pollera, manta y sombrero), su lengua materna es el Aymará que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con su esposo que se dedica a l mismo negocio, viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina y piso de madera que cuenta con agua potable, energía eléctrica, gas domiciliario y alcantarillado. Su negocio es la
fabricación de zapatos y botas tradicionales para el uso en diferentes danzas folclóricas como; caporales, morenada y diablada, entre otros, “inicié mi actividad desde muy joven porque mi familia se dedicaba al negocio, ahora trabajo con mi esposo…” comenta. la ventaja de su negocio es que cuenta con clientes continuos la desventaja es la falta de dinero para la compra de material de confección, como; cuero, tela, suelas y otros. Su sueño es contratar personas para la fabricación por mayor, ella desea realizar la compra de material de confección de zapatos. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 35 años que desarrolla esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que willma solicita un préstamo para comprar material de confección de zapatos, contratar empleados y vender por mayor.
texts.en:
Wilma is a 55 years old woman, married and has 3 adult children. In her business she manufactures shoes.  She is an entrepreneur, strong, determined, reliable, dedicated, organized, responsible and a hard worker. She carries her business in the “Tembladerani” area. This area is known because the soccer stadium of a popular team is located there. The climate is cold and dry with a temperature that varies between -1/16 C degrees.

Wilma has a dark complexion, brown eyes, and long black hair that she braids. She is of short stature and has a medium build. She wears traditional clothes (skirt, shawl and hat).
