Вот почему швейное дело в Таджикистане столь популярна. Гилнигор решила расширить бизнес и привезти обувь на продажу. Она расширить ассортимент товара и привлечет больше клиентов. Для реализации ее плана необходимы финансы, которых она надеется получить за счет кредита.
texts.en: Gilnigor is 37 years old. She is a cheerful, energetic woman and the mother of two children. She is married to a construction worker. Her children, who are 10 and 12 years old, are in middle school. Gilnigor sells fabric to be made into clothing. Tajik women generally prefer to buy a fabric they like, then take it to a seamstress to sew. That's why sewing is such popular work in Tajikistan. Gilnigor has decided to expand her business by bringing in shoes to sell. She is expanding her inventory and attracting new customers. She needs the financial means to carry out her plan, and she is hoping to get that through a loan.

loans.use: To buy shoes to sell and to expand her assortment of goods.

loans.name: Neslihan

texts.en:
Neslihan is married and has two children.  When her husband's salary was not enough Neslihan started making and selling home made Turkish raviolis first to her relatives and then to her neighbours. With the help of the loan from Maya she purchased bulk flour and minced meat and made many raviolis, increased her products and sold them.  In the future she wants her children to get a good education.
Translated from Turkish by Maya staff.
Neslihan hanım evli ve 2 çocuk annesi.  Eşinin maaşı giderlere yetmeyince Neslihan Hanım da yaptığı mantıları önce akraba çevresine daha sonra komşularına satmaya başlamış.  Maya'dan aldığı kredilerle toplu olarak un ve kıyma aldı ve bunları mantıya çevirerek satışlarını hızlandırdı.  Gelecekte çocuklarının iyi bir eğitim almasını istiyor.

loans.use: to buy flour and mince

loans.name: Selma

texts.en:
Selma is 45 years old and she has a child.  She is making needle crochets and lace which contributes to her family budget.  She has gained self confidence by making money on her own.  With the help of her loans from Maya she purchased a lot of materials for her lace and increased the variety of products. 

Translated from Turkish by Maya staff

Selma Hanım 45 yaşında ve bir çocuk annesi.  İğne oyası ve dantel yapıp satarak aile ekonomisine katkı sağlıyor.  Sürekli yaptığı bu işten para kazanması kendine olan özgüvenini artırmış.  Mayadan kullandığı krediler ile dantel ipi alarak ürün çeşitliliğini artırdı.

loans.use: to buy material to make lace

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy items to sell in his retail shop

loans.name: Tülay

texts.en:
Tülay is 41 years old and a mother of three.  Tülay wanted to support her husband and to financially help her children's school needs.  She was in search of a solution.  She thought that she could sell her home made pasta and Turkish raviolis. First, she mentioned this to her friends.  She started selling the pasta and raviolis to her friends.  Now she is on her 2nd loan from Maya.  In the future she is planning to open a shop of her own and sell Turkish ravioli.

Translated from Turkish by Maya staff

Tülay hanım 41 yaşında ve 3 çocuk annesi.  Tülay hanım çocuklarının okul ihtiyaçlarını karşılamak ve eşine destek olmak amacıyla ek iş arayışına girmiş.  Yaptığı makarna ve mantıların ev yapımı olunca satılabileceğini düşünmüş.  Önce çalışan arkadaş çevresine söylemiş ve onlardan sipariş alarak satışlarına başlamış.  Maya dan 2. kredini kullanan Tülay Hanım gelecekte mantı dükkanı açmak istiyor.

loans.use: to buy Turkish ravioli material

loans.name: Las Divinas Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado LAS DIVINAS se formó en la ciudad de Asunción, ellas forman parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, como un medio para conocer la situación de vida de cada una, y conforme a ello poder esforzarse por mejorar su situación de vida.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Daniela, quien se dedica a la costura, tiene muy buena clientela ya que siempre le llevan muchos pedidos, y debido a que hace muy buenos trabajos, está creciendo cada día. Ella está haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza, que le permitió conocer su situación de vida y luchar por mejorarla.
Daniela pide este préstamo para la compra de telas, hilos, gomas, y otros, de manera a poder seguir con sus confecciones como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder mejorar cada día.
texts.en:
The group called "Las Divinas" was formed in the city of Asunción.  They make up part of the program for elimination of poverty, as a means of understanding each person's situation in life, and accordingly to strive to improve their position in life.  

One of the members is Daniela, who makes a living in dressmaking.  She has very good clientele since they always make many orders, and since she does very good jobs, her business is growing every day.  She is doing the survey for the elimination of poverty, which allowed her to understand her situation in life and fight to improve it.  

Daniela is requesting this loan for the purchase of cloth, thread, elastic, and other items, as a way to be able to continue with her dressmaking as she has been doing.  She is grateful for the opportunity she has received to be able to improve every day.

loans.use: to buy cloth, needles, elastic, and other supplies to use in dressmaking.

loans.name: Graciela

texts.es:
La Sra. Graciela proviene de una familia humilde y trabajadora, muy joven quedó huérfana de madre y padre. Ella trabaja en la agricultura y ganadería, actividad antigua de la familia. Aparte de eso para su sustento diario se dedica a la confección de ropas artesanales.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar materiales de construcción para poder terminar la construcción de su casa.
texts.en:
Graciela comes from a humble and hardworking family. She was orphaned at a very young age when se lost her mother and her father. She works in agriculture and ranching, an old activity of her family. In addition, she makes artisanal clothing. 

She is asking for this loan to be able to buy construction materials to build her house.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Zoia

texts.en:
Zoia, a 67 year-old woman, lives in the village of Metekhi. She has an invalid daughter, a son, a daughter-in-law and 3 grandchildren. This large family earns a living with dairy farming. Zoia takes care of milk-cows and sells milk-products at the local market. Her daughter-in-law is also a teacher and gets a fixed salary. Zoia wants to somehow to increase her family's living conditions and also help her son, who is temporarily unemployed. She requested financial support and received the credit in the framework of the joint initiative of Kiva and Credo - Startup Program that gives rural poor people the chance to start or re-start businesses. Zoia will purchase a mini-bus for her son, who will start selling fruits and vegetables. He will purchase products at wholesale prices and will transport them through the region and sell at increased-prices. 
Zoia is a very enthusiastic and hard working person with a great desire to ensure her family members with good style of life.  This credit will be a great support for the family. Zoia is thankful to Kiva Lenders for giving her family the chance to increase their income.

loans.use: To purchase a mini-bus and start selling fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Roza

texts.en:
Roza, 50 years old, is a married woman, that lives in the Samtredia district. She has a husband, daughter and a son. The family members are temporarily unemployed and the only source of income for them is from their small agricultural activity. Roza wants to help with her bit for the family's welfare, as they find it hard to meet all daily costs and family-expenses. She wants to start her own business and make some money. All the financial institutions rejected her loan requests because of her unstable financial conditions and lack of experience.  After several unsuccessful attempts, Roza applied for the credit to MFO Credo. Her request was approved in the framework of the Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva, permitting the rural poor to start or re-start businesses. 
Roza will purchase clothing stock of various kinds at wholesale prices in the capital, where the country's largest market is located. She will re-sell the products in her community among her neighbors throughout the town. 
This will give her a chance to earn income and become financially independent. With regards to the Start Up program she will be able to make her payments and provide a better future for her family.

loans.use: To sell clothing and make her own income

loans.name: Saodat

texts.ru: На фотографии запечатлена 37 летняя жительница городка Худжанд по имени Саодат. Саодат начинающий предприниматель. Она почти год занимается продажей женской одежды. Пока что у нее нет большой клиентской базы. Саодат планирует иметь большой ассортимент товара и привлечь много клиентов и в будущем иметь собственный магазин - это ее мечта. С такими планами она обратилась за кредитом. На деньги от кредита, Саодат купить женской одежды на любой вкус и размер.
texts.en: This photograph shows a 37 year old Khujand resident named Saodat. Saodat is a beginning entrepreneur. She has been selling women's clothing for almost a year. She doesn't have a large clientele yet. Saodat's dream is to have her own store, once she builds a large inventory of goods and attracts many clients. She is requesting a loan to help with this plan. She will use the loaned money to buy women's clothing in every style and size.

loans.use: To expand her inventory of women's clothing for sale

loans.name: Yvoty 2 Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Yvoty 2 está en su ciclo número 2 del programa de comité de mujeres, las 15 integrantes del comité realizan muchos esfuerzos para así poder salir adelante junto con sus familias. 
Se destaca entre ellas la Sra. Pabla, quien hace comidas ella misma, y que después sale a vender de manera ambulante, es una persona muy buena en la elaboración de comidas, es por ello que tiene bastantes clientes. Pabla se define como una mujer que quiere salir adelante por medio de su trabajo y su esfuerzo.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar carne, verduras, condimentos, hortalizas, panificados y otros, para poder seguir con la elaboración de sus comidas como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
The group named Yvoty 2 is in its 2nd cycle of the women's committee program. The 15 members of the committee work very hard to be able to get ahead with their families.
 
Among them Pabla stands out. She makes food herself and goes out to sell it as a street vendor. She is very good at preparing food. That is why she has a lot of customers. Pabla is defined as a woman who wants to get ahead through her work and efforts.

She is asking for this loan to buy meat, vegetables, seasonings, produce, bread products and more, in order to get ahead with making her food, as she has been doing.

loans.use: to buy meat, vegetables, seasonings, produce, bread products and more.

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Del Km 11 Group

texts.es:
Mujeres Unidas del Km 11 está integrado por 19 mujeres, todas ellas mujeres unidas y trabajadoras que quieren ayudar a su familia y a sus seres queridos por medio del trabajo unido de todas.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Maria, quien trabaja en las confecciones, tiene muy buenas manos para eso, y por ello que tiene muchos clientes. Maria es una mujer muy emprendedora que poco a poco se ha abierto camino y hoy ya es conocida.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar telas, hilos, agujas,etc., y con ello poder seguir con sus confecciones como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder mejorar y crecer.
texts.en:
Mujeres Unidas del Km 11 is made up of 19 women. All of them are united and hardworking women who want to help their families and their loved ones with all of their work together.

One of the members is Maria,who works sewing clothes. She has very good hands for this and that is why she has a lot of customers. Maria is a very enterprising woman who has made way little by little and is well known today.

She is asking for this loan to buy fabric, thread, needles, etc., and with it continue with her sewing as she has been doing. She is grateful for the opportunity to be able to improve and grow.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, thread, needles, etc.

loans.name: San Rafael Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado San Rafael  está en su ciclo número 4 del programa de comité de mujeres, todas ellas se fijaron como meta ayudarse las unas a las otras para poder dar a sus familias todo lo que ellas no pudieron tener.
Geronima se dedica al humilde trabajo de la venta de remedios naturales que lo hace de manera ambulante, comenta que por medio de su sacrificado trabajo tiene los escasos ingresos para poder dar a su familia lo que necesitan para el día a día. Es una mujer muy trabajadora y sacrificada.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar remedios naturales para la venta, y con ello poder seguir con su trabajo, luchando por poder mejorar cada día.
texts.en:
San Rafael group is going through their 4th loan cycle of the women's committee program. Every single one of them set the goal of helping one another to provide their families with those things they couldn't have when they were younger.
Geronima is a humble worker that sells natural remedies door to door. She says that with her small income she was able to cover her family's day to day needs. She is hard working hand has made many sacrifices.
She is asking for a loan to buy natural remedies to resell and continue working,  strugging to improve more and more every day.

loans.use: to buy natural remedies for retail.

loans.name: Perla

texts.es: PERLA: Es una mujer miskita originaria de Waspam Río Coco; es luchadora, tiene 49 años de edad, es casada, tiene 3 hijos mayores de edad e independientes. Su esposo trabaja como abogado. Está solicitando un préstamo para construir un anexo de madera, con el propósito de brindarle a su familia una vivienda más segura y con mayor calidad de vida. Con el préstamo podrá comprar: madera, clavos, zinc y cubrir costo de mano de obra. Su sueño es llegar a construir un sistema de agua y saneamiento seguro, ya que toda su vida ha utilizado letrina.
texts.en:
Pearl is a Miskita woman originally from Waspam, Río Coco. She is a fighter. She is 49 years old, married, and has three adult and independent children. Her husband works as a lawyer. 

She is requesting a loan to build a wooden annex with the purpose of giving her family a safer home with a higher quality of life. With the loan, she will be able to buy wood, nails, zinc, and cover labor costs. Her dream is to be able to build a water system and a safe sanitation, since all her life she has been using a latrine.

loans.use: to build a wooden annex.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase a large amount of beer to resell, so as to earn more

loans.name: Las Divinas 2 Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado LAS DIVINAS 2 está en su ciclo número uno del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas se pusieron como meta el crecimiento de cada una, no solo en lo económico, sino también en lo personal.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Ezequiela, quien en su última encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza mostró un nivel tres, lo que quiere decir que ha ido mejorando poco a poco y a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y por medio de la costura que hace. Ella es una persona muy buena en lo que hace, es por eso que tiene ya muy buena clientela que siempre le lleva muchos pedidos.
La Sra. Ezequiela  solicita de este prestamo para la compra de telas, y así poder concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The group named LAS DIVINAS 2 is in its first loan cycle with the women's committee program. All the members have set the goal of achieving growth—not only on the financial level but also on a personal level.

Ezequiela is one of the members. In her latest poverty elimination survey, she showed a level of three, which means that she has been improving gradually through her hard and constant work as a seamstress. 

She is a person who is very good at what she does. This is why she has a good customer base, who always places many orders.

Ezequiela is requesting this loan to buy fabrics. With this purchase, she will be able to fulfill her business plan and improve her income.

loans.use: to buy fabrics for her sewing business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy supplies and ingredients to make deep fried snacks and enchiladas

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase a large amount of vegetables (tomatoes, eggplant) to resell, so as to earn more

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase a large amount of bananas to process into beer to resell, so as to earn more

loans.name: Virgen De La Asuncion Group

texts.es:
El grupo VIRGEN DE ASUNCIÓN  está haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza, donde  todas quieren superar su situación de pobreza, por medio de las capacitaciones y la ayuda que les da la fundación paraguaya.
 La Sra. Teodora es una  las integrantes quien se dedica a la venta de prendas varias y de calzados, es una mujer muy trabajadora, que por medio de su esfuerzo se ha abierto camino y hoy día ya tiene muy buena clientela. Comenta que quiere seguir capacitándose para poder crecer en lo que es su emprendimiento.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar prendas  calzados varios, de manera a poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo y mejorando.
texts.en:
The Virgen de Asuncion group is participating of the erradication of poverty survey, where every single member is eager to get out of poverty, thanks to training and support from Fundación Paraguaya.
Teodora is one of the members. She sells clothing and shoes. She is hard working and thanks to her efforts she has open a door that has allowed her to gain great customers. She says she would like to continue her training to be able to grow her business.
She is asking for a loan to buy clothing and shoes to keep up with her sales. She is thankful for this opportunity to continue to grow and improve.

loans.use: to buy clothing and shoes to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy nail polish, nail clippers, nail polish remover and other products

loans.name: Silvia

texts.es:
La señora Silvia es casada, tiene 3 hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de Ropas en forma ambulante realiza sus ventas a una clientela formada. Silvia está viviendo en con su familia en una casa cómoda y con todas sus necesidades
Hoy día ella tiene una clientela formada y muy responsable con ella. Es una persona muy responsable y con ganas de superación.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar prendas variadas para la venta, y con ello poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Silvia is married. She has 3 children and she sells clothing as a street vendor. She sells to regular customers. Silvia is living with her family in a comfortable house with all of the necessities. 

Today she has regular customers and she is very responsible with them. She is a responsible person who really wants to get ahead. She is asking for this loan to buy items of clothing to sell and with it be able to continue with her work as she has been doing.

loans.use: to buy different items of clothing to sell.

loans.name: Twende Mbele Group

texts.fr: Magambo est commerçante, membre de la banque communautaire «Twende Mbele», cliente de l’IMF Hekima, âgée de 52 ans, mariée, mère de 10 enfants dont 5 écoliers, 2 étudiants et 3 sont mariés. Elle est vendeuse des souliers usagés dans un marché du centre ville depuis 30ans. Elle commença son business avec de fonds reçu de son mari. Pour accroitre son activité, elle va acheter 100 paires de souliers. Elle souhaite scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au finish, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables.
texts.en:
Magambo is a merchant and a member of the community bank called “Twende Mbele”. A client of the microfinance institution Hekima, she is 52 years old and a married mother of ten children, of whom five are in elementary school, two are students, and three are married. 

Magambo has been a vendor of secondhand shoes at a market downtown for thirty years. She began her business with funds from her husband. To grow her business, she is going to purchase 100 pairs of shoes. Her wish is to provide schooling and food for her children. In conclusion, she thanks Hekima for supporting unbanked entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to purchase 100 pairs of shoes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy two dairy cows in order to sell the eco-friendly milk

loans.name: Anvarhan

texts.ru: Анвархан, 60 лет, замужем, есть взрослый сын и 2 внуков. У Анвархан средне-специальное образование, на пенсии, но продолжает работать учителем в школе. В качестве дохода для своей семьи Анвархан занимается животноводством, стартовав в 2010 году благодаря упорству, целеустремленности и трудолюбию Анвархан, на сегодняшний день у нее есть: 4 коровы, 15 овец. Ежемесячный доход от бизнеса составляет около 12,000 сом (KGS). Анвархан обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) для покупки овец, так как цены на скот сейчас снизились. Анвархан намерена свои доходы от кредита направить на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Anvarhan is 60 years old, married, and has a grown son and two grandchildren. She has a secondary vocational education and is now receiving a pension though she continues to work as a school teacher. Anvarhan also raises livestock to earn money for her family. She started this business in 2010, and thanks to her dedication, perseverance, and hard work she currently owns four cows and 15 sheep. The business produces a monthly income around 12,000 som (KGS). Anvarhan is asking the Bai-Tushum bank for a 50,000 som (KGS) loan to buy sheep, since the price of livestock has fallen. Anvarhan plans to use income from use of the loan on home repairs.

loans.use: to purchase additional sheep in expand her herd

loans.name: Kuña Aty Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Kuña Aty es un grupo nuevo, donde todas las integrantes están dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, son mujeres luchadoras que quieren crecer y mejorar con su trabajo.
Una de las que integra este grupo es la Sra. Cristina, quien tiene una despensa bien surtida y que comenta pudo montar su negocio con sacrificio y lo está sacando adelante con sacrificio y lucha. Es una mujer muy trabajadora que quiere salir adelante.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de verduras, frutas, carne, bebidas y otros, de manera a poder seguir con sus ventas. Las integrantes agradecen por la oportunidad que reciben de poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Kuña Aty is a brand new group. All its members are participating of the erradication of proverty program. They are hard-working women who want to grow and improve their working situation.
One of the members is Cristina. She owns a general store and she says she was able to stablish her business with a lot or sacrifice and she is getting ahead thanks to her hard work. She is a great worker and wants to keep growing.
She is asking for a loan to buy vegetables, fruit, meat, soft drinks and other products to resell. All the members are thankful for this opportunity to continue to grow.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, fruit, meat, soft drinks and other products to resell.

loans.name: Mujeres De Tajy Group

texts.es:
El grupo Mujeres de Tajy  está en su ciclo número 8  del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. A través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y por medio del trabajo de todas quieren salir adelante.
Angelina es una mujer muy trabajadora y emprendedora, que con esfuerzo y sacrificio esta trabajando para poder salir adelante. Ella tiene una despensa en la que trabaja todos los días desde muy tempranas horas del día hasta tarde en la noche, es una mujer muy sacrificada.
Pide este préstamo para poder surtir su negocio con verduras, frutas, carne, bebidas, panificados y otros. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo y luchando para ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
Mujeres de Tajy [Tajy Women] group is in its number 8 cycle of the committee of women program, where they all work and help each other to move forward. Through the effort and continuous work and through the work of all, they want to succeed.

Angelina is a very hardworking and enterprising woman, who with effort and sacrifice is working to be able to get ahead. She has a store where she works every day from very early hours of the day until late at night. She is a very sacrificing woman.

She is requesting this loan to be able to stock her business with vegetables, fruits, meat, beverages, baked goods, and others. She is grateful for the opportunity she receives to keep growing and fighting to help her family.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, fruits, meat, beverages, baked goods, and others.

loans.name: Benkadi Group

texts.fr:
Gouankoura est la femme qui tienne la corde du mouton.
C’est une brave paysanne Malienne âgée de 54 ans, elle est mariée et mère de 4 enfants, dont 1 garçon et 1 fille vont à l’école mais les 2 autres n’ont pas été orienté après le DEF.
Ces enfants sont âgés de 10 à 20 ans. Gouankoura n’a pas eu la chance d’aller à l’école. Son mari cultivait la terre pour gagner sa vie avant qu’il ne devient aveugle depuis 3 ans.
Elle fait l’agriculture et l’embouche ovine il y a 20 ans de cela.
Elle fait recourt à l’IMF pour soutenir son embouche ovine à travers l’achat de moutons maigres, son, du mil, aliment bétail avec des médicaments.
Le font qu’elle reçoit du RMCR est investi dans son activé d’embouche ovine.
Elle s’approvisionne dans les marchés locaux, après l’engraissement de ces moutons, elle revend dans les mêmes marchés.
Son rêve est de gagné beaucoup d’ argent pour pouvoir cultiver un grand champs puis acheter assez de moutons pour vendre afin  de générer beaucoup plus de profit pour le bien être de ses enfants (Habillement, nourriture, santé, éducation). 
son bénéfice périvisuel mensuel est de 8000FCFA.
texts.en:
Gouankoura, the woman holding the sheep’s rope, is a good and honest Malian woman and a peasant farmer. She is 54 years old and a married mother of four children, of whom a boy and a girl are going to school, but the other two were not guided after the DEF. These children are 10 to 20 years old. Gouankoura did not have the chance to go to school. Her husband used to farm the land to earn his living before he became blind three years ago. Gouankoura is a farmer and fattens sheep, and she has been doing this for twenty years. 

She has turned to the microfinance institution RMCR to support her livestock farming through the purchase of underweight sheep, bran, animal feed and medicines. The funds from RMCR are invested in her sheep business. She gets her supplies from the local markets, fattens the sheep, and then resells them at the same markets. 

Her dream is to earn a lot of money to be able to farm a large field and then to purchase enough sheep to sell, so as to generate much more profit for the sake of her children’s well-being (clothing, food, healthcare, education). Her projected monthly profit is 8,000 francs CFA.

loans.use: to purchase underweight sheep to resell after fattening them

loans.name: Ana Cristina

texts.es:
Ana cristina es una joven de 27 años de edad que inicio en el año 2013 una venta de accesorios para celulares, ella es una madre de  una pequeña menor y cabeza de familia, esta mujer se la ha esforzado enormemente por la crianza y futuro de hija y ahora en épocas difíciles donde no cuenta con capital quiere solicitar un préstamo para abastecer su negocio que gracias a la virilidad de los accesorios para celulares han crecido sus ventas y quiere estar a la vanguardia y tener accesorios para todo móviles.

Ana cristina quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de accesorios para celulares Android, iPhone, carcasas, audífonos y repuestos.

Estos accesorios ayudaran mucho a atraer clientes y que la refieran a otras personas ya que un negocio como este en vereda es muy difícil de encontrar.
texts.en:
Ana Cristina is a young woman of 27 years who began selling accessories for cell phones in 2013.  She is mother of a small child and is head of her family.  This woman has done a great deal for the upbringing and future of her daughter.  Now, in difficult times where she does not have capital, she wants to apply for a loan to stock her business.  Thanks to the masculinity of the cell phone accessories, her sales have increased and she wants to be at the forefront and have accessories for all cell phones.

Ana Cristina is requesting a loan for the purchase of accessories for iPhones and Android phones, cases, headphones, and spare parts.  

These accessories will greatly help her to attract customers and that they refer other people to her since a business like this is hard to find in the area.

loans.use: to stock up on accessories for cell phones.

loans.name: Dionicia

texts.es:
La Sra. Dionicia es viuda, tiene 4 hijos todos independientes ya de ella, los 4 ya son universitarios, los cuales pudo sacar adelante con sacrificio y esfuerzo.
La Sra. Dionicia tiene un vivero de plantas de estación. 
Ella inicio su negocio con el dinero que gano trabajando en otro país, pero con su esfuerzo se fue abriendo camino. Gracias al trabajo que ha realizado compra todas las necesidades de su hogar.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de plantas, semillas y abono, para poder seguir con su trabajo y sus ventas.
texts.en: Mrs. Dionicia is a widow. She has 4 children all independent from her.They are all college graduates,  and she was able to help them get ahead with sacrifice and effort. Mrs. Dionicia has a nursery with seasonal plants. She started her business with the money she earned working in another country. but with her effort she was able to get ahead. Thanks to the work she has done she has bought all she needed for her home. She is asking for a loan to buy plants, seeds, and manure, to continue with her work and sales.

loans.use: To buy plants, seeds and manure.

loans.name: Macaria

texts.es: MACARIA: Es una mujer luchadora, tiene 35 años de edad, originaria del municipio de Puerto Cabezas, pertenece a la etnia miskita. Está casada, tiene 1 un pequeño hijo de 5 años  de edad. Con el propósito de construir poco a poco su vivienda de tambo y madera y surtir su pequeña pulpería que tiene desde hace un año en una vivienda donde alquila, pagando una mensualidad de C$1,600 (Un Mil Seis Cientos Córdobas Netos). Esta solicitando financiamiento para comprar materiales de construcción: madera, clavos, zinc y cubrir costos de mano de obra. También invertir un poco en granos básicos, chiverías, detergentes, entre otros productos. Ella sueña con llegar a tener una vivienda de concreto para que su familia esté más segura, y terminar su carrera de licenciatura en administración de empresas.
texts.en: Macaria is a hard working woman. She is 35 years old, she is from Puerto Cabezas municipality, and she beliongs to the miskita ethnic group. She is married, she has 1 small child age 5 years old. She has the purpose of building her house little by little with cane and wood, and be able to supply her small grocery store which she opened a year ago at the house she rents from, and paying C1,600 cordovas. She is asking for a loan to buy building materials: wood, nails, zinc and to pay for labor costs. She also wants to buy basic grains, snacks, detergents, among other products. She dreams with having a house made of concrete, so that her family would be safer and to finish her degree in business administration.

loans.use: to build her house little by little of cane and wood and supply her small grocery store.

loans.name: Paulina Auxiliadora

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Sagrado Corazón se reúne cada 15 días en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
Aquí vive la señora Pualina, tiene 74 años de edad, es divorciada y de esta relación tienen 7 hijos mayores de edad, una hija vive con ella.
Doña Paulina es una mujer que le encanta trabajar para salir adelante, ella se dedica al comercio, vende ropa, zapatos, bisuterías, sabanas, entre otros productos, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, ella sale tres o cuatro  días  por las tardes y también vende en su casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes más conocidos, su hija también le ayuda con sus ventas, ella es maestra y les vende a sus compañeras de trabajo y madres de familia cuando le piden, de esta forma ella le ayuda a su mamá ya que los ingresos son para los gastos del hogar. Tiene más de 15 años que se dedica a este negocio.
Este crédito es para comprar ropa, zapatos, bisuterías, entre otras cosas que vende. Está desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito d y le gusta porque los créditos son rápidos. Sus sueños es seguir mejorando y tener buena salud.
texts.en:
The Grupo de Crédito Sagrado Corazón [Sacred Heart Credit Group] meets every two weeks in the city of Manta, which is known for its beautiful beaches that are well-visited throughout the year and for being a city with incomparable beauty with many tourist attractions. This is where 74 year-old Paulina lives. She is divorced and has seven adult children from that relationship, and one daughter lives with her. 

Paulina is a woman who loves to work in order to get ahead. She works in commerce selling clothing, shoes, costume jewelry and linens, among other products. She sells door to door three or four days a week in the afternoon and she also makes sales from her home to clients whom she knows better. Her daughter also helps her with sales. She is a teacher and she sells to her coworkers and mothers of the families when they request it. In this way she is able to help her mom since the income is for household expenses. Paulina has been engaged in this business for more than 15 years. 

This loan is for purchasing clothing, shoes and costume jewelry, among other things that she sells. She has been in the Credit Group from the start and she likes it because the loans are quick. Her dreams are to continue improving and to be in good health.

loans.use: to purchase clothing, shoes, costume jewelry, etc.

loans.name: Francisco Antonio

texts.es: FRANCISCO ANTONIO: Es un joven emprendedor de 19 años de edad, amable, originario de la Ciudad de Bilwi, municipio de Puerto Cabezas, casado. Debido a la falta de un empleo formal y con el deseo de contribuir con los gastos del hogar y sacar adelante a su familia, desde hace 1 año estableció una pequeña pulpería. Recuerda con gran alegría que inicio con C$6,000 (Seis Mil Córdobas Netos) de capital propio, fruto del ahorro y apoyo de su esposa, quien labora en una librería. Esta solicitando su primer financiamiento para surtir su pequeño negocio, con el préstamo quiere comprar: granos básicos, chivería, detergentes, gaseosas, papel higiénico, toallas sanitarias, entre otros productos. El y su familia sueñan con tener una abarrotería donde pueda obtener mejores ganancia y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: FRANCISCO ANTONIO is a young 19 year old entrepreneur. He is polite, originally from the city of Bilwi, in the municipality of Puerto Cabezas and is married. Due to the lack of a formal job and with a desire to contribute to household expenses and help his family get ahead, 1 year ago, he established a small grocery store. Francisco remembers with great joy that he started with C $ 6,000 (Six Thousand Córdobas Net) of his own money. This money was the result of savings and support of his wife, who works in a bookstore. Francisco is requesting his first loan to stock his small business. With the loan  he wants to buy basic grains, chivería [snacks], detergents, soda, toilet paper, sanitary napkins, and other products. He and his family dream of owning a grocery store where they can get better income and improve the quality of life of the family.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, chivería [snacks], detergents, soda, toilet paper, sanitary napkins, and other products

loans.name: Marta Maria

texts.es: MARTA MARÍA: Es una señora jovial, trabajadora de 52 años de edad. Originaria de Puerto Cabezas, pertenece a la etnia miskita. Madre soltera de 3 hijos mayores de edad. Desde hace aproximadamente 15 años vive en una casita de madera y tambo. Con el propósito de mejorar el techo de su vivienda y que su familia viva de manera segura y digna, está solicitando financiamiento para comprar: zinc, clavos y cubrir costos de mano de obra. Su sueño es tener una casa segura y de concreto (cemento), ya que es de mayor seguridad y duración.
texts.en:
Marta Maria is a jovial, hard working 52 year old woman. Originally from Puerto Cabezas, she is of Miskita ethnicity. She is a single mother of 3 adult children. She has lived in a home made with wooden stilts for approximately 15 years. 

She is requesting this loan, with the intention of improving the roof of her home and for her family to live in a secure and dignified way, to buy: tin, nails and to cover labor costs. Her dream is to have a safe and concrete (cement) home since it is safer and longer lasting.

loans.use: to improve the roof of her home made with wooden stilts.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: ELIZABETH: Es una mujer luchadora, sonriente de 29 años de edad, originaria del municipio de Puerto de Cabezas, madre soltera de 3 hijos menores de edad. Desde hace 2 años habitan en una vivienda de tambo y madera. Con el propósito de brindarle a sus hijos una vivienda digna y segura, solicita financiamiento para cambiar madera, con el préstamo comprara: madera, clavos y cubrir los costos de mano de obra. Su sueño es llegar a tener una vivienda de concreto (cemento) porque es de mayor durabilidad.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is a smiling, hard-working woman of 29 from the municipality of Puerto Cabezas. She is the single mother of three children.

They have been living for two years in a wooden stilt home. With the objective of providing her children with decent and safe housing, she is applying for a loan to replace wood. With the loan she will buy lumber, nails, and pay for labor.

Her dream is to have a house made of concrete, because it is more durable.

loans.use: To replace the wood in her stilt home.

loans.name: Ariela

texts.es:
La Sra. Ariela tiene 35 años, está casada, con el Sr. Julio de 35 años de edad, tiene 6 hijos, por quienes ambos están poniendo lo mejor para poder  salir adelante.
Ariela  se inició en este rubro hace más de 4 años,   el cual es la despensa, tiene muy buena clientela que pudo formarse con el transcurso del tiempo y gracias a su esfuerzo.
Este préstamo lo pide para comprar fideos, azúcar, gaseosas, vinos, etc., lo cual ayudara a mejorar sus ingresos por el volumen de venta.
texts.en:
Ariela is 35 years old and is married to Julio—aged 35. They have six children, so both Ariela and Julio make their best efforts to get ahead.

Ariela set up a grocery store more than four years ago. Over time, she has managed to build a good customer base through her hard work.

She is requesting this loan to buy noodles, sugar, sodas, wine, and the like. This purchase will help her increase her sales volume, thus improving her income.

loans.use: to buy noodles, sugar, sodas, wine, and the like.

loans.name: Kelvin Acquah

texts.en:
Kelvin is pursuing a Bachelor of Science degree at the Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology. He is requesting this loan to help pay for his tuition fees.

His older brother inspires him to achieve his goals because he has the fear of God in him, and is a strong-minded person who always reaches his targets. He would like to be a lecturer in the future, so that the knowledge and the skills he has acquired can be imparted to the younger generation to help them become responsible citizens.

Without this loan his other option would have been to solicit funds from family members, a option which would not be so reliable.

”Ghanaians are open and we welcome visitors from around the world” he says.

loans.use: to pay hostel and tuition fees

loans.name: Liana

texts.en:
Liana is from the village of Norio and lives with her husband, who is a private artisan of tractors. Liana is temporarily unemployed. In the region there is a high unemployment rate, but self-employment helps inhabitants to make living. She has decided to start a trading business with a loan, but the local credit providers usually demand experience and some stable income from their borrowers. 

With this loan of 5,000 USD, she will open a store selling spare parts and oils for tractors and gain a stable source of income for her family. She needs money to renovate the space and purchase stock of spare parts and oils. Her husband has a great deal of experience in this kind of activity, and will lead the business professionally. The family will gain a significant source of income and will be able to cover everyday costs more effectively.

Liana and her husband rely on the goodwill of lenders and will be very thankful for help in maintaining their own business.

loans.use: To open a store selling spare parts and oils for tractors

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a propane gas stove.

loans.name: Asim

texts.ru: Это парень Асим. Он житель города Худжанд. Он родился в семьи рабочих. Они все бизнес-люди. Его брат находится в Китае. Он там занимается бизнесом. Асим тоже занимается продажей аккумуляторов автомашин. Он отправляет деньги брату, а его брат из Китая перевозит аккумуляторы на продажу. Вот так Асим занимается бизнесом с братом. У нее имеется магазин, где он продает аккумулятор. Асим женатый человек. Его жена занимается шитьем женской одежды. Его мама на рынке занимается торговлей. Азим в городе живет вместе матерью, женой и маленьким сыном. Данный момент Асим решил расширить деятельность. Он хочет, взят кредит, и отправить деньги брату для купли аккумуляторы. У нее большие планы в будущем. Асим хочет стать большим бизнесменом. Поддержите его достичь своих целей.
texts.en: The name of this young man is Asim. He is a resident of the town of Khujand. He was born in a working-class family. All of them are business people. His brother is in China and is involved in business there. Asim is also involved in selling car batteries. He sends money to his brother, who then brings in batteries from China for sale. This is how Asim does business with his brother. He has a store, where he sells the batteries. Asim is a married man, His wife is involved in sewing women's clothing. His mother is involved in sales at a market. Asim lives in his town with his mother, wife and a young son. Now Asim decided to expand his business. He wants to obtain a loan and send money to his brother to buy batteries. He has big plans in the future. Asim wants to become a successful businessman. Please support him in achieving his goals.

loans.use: to buy car batteries for resale

loans.name: Tania Teffany

texts.es: TANIA TEFFANY: Es una mujer alegre, luchadora de 29 años de edad, originaria de la Ciudad de Bilwi, del municipio de Puerto Cabezas, pertenece a la etnia creole. Está casada con 2 hijos: El mayor de 12 años estudia su segundo año de secundaria y el menor de 10 años, cursa su sexto grado de primaria. Su esposo es odontólogo. Desde hace 4 años estableció su salón de belleza, generando sus ingresos propios con lo cual aporta económicamente en el hogar. Ante la dificultad de no tener garantías materiales, para acceder al crédito fue coordinadora del grupo solidario Stefanny, por un periodo de 4 años, ahora que ha ido mejorando sus ingresos, ha ido adquiriendo bienes materiales como electrodomésticos que ya puede poner en garantía, por lo que se ha desligado del Grupo Solidario y está solicitando su primer crédito individual para comprar productos de belleza: tintes, tratamientos para cabello, entre otros productos. Ella sueña con ampliar su salón y establecer una tienda de ropa usada.
texts.en:
Tania Teffany is a happy, hard working 29 year old woman. Originally from the city of Bilwi in the Puerto Cabezas municipality, she is of Creole ethnicity. She is married with 2 children. The eldest, 12 years old, is in his second year of middle school and the youngest, 10 years old, is in sixth grade. Her husband is a dentist. 

She established her beauty salon 4 years ago, generating her own income with which she financially contributes to her household. Given the difficulty in accessing credit without physical collateral, she coordinated the Stefanny communal bank for a period of 4 years. Now that she has been increasing her income, she has acquired material assets, like appliances, which she can give as collateral. This is why she has removed herself from the communal bank and is requesting her first individual loan to buy beauty products - dye and hair treatments, among other products. She dreams of expanding her salon and establishing a used clothing store.

loans.use: to buy beauty products - dye and hair treatments, among other products.

loans.name: Farogat

texts.ru: На фотографии Фарогат со своей невесткой. Именно для ее обучения Фарогат обратилась за кредитом и благодаря кредиторам KIVA нее невестка Тахмина смогла с отличием закончить третий курс Института экономики и торговли . Скоро начнется 4 год обучения и ей необходимо снова обратиться за кредитом. Фарогат и Тахмина верят, что ее снова поддержат и безгранично Вам благодарны.
texts.en: The photograph shows Farogat and her daughter-in-law. Farogat requested a loan specifically for her daughter-in-law's education, and, thanks to the Kiva lenders, her daughter-in-law, Tahmina, was able to complete her third year of the Economics and Trade Institute with honors. She will soon begin her fourth year of studies and needs to obtain a loan again. Farogat and Tahmina believe that they will be supported again and are infinitely grateful to You.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter-in-law's university tuition

loans.name: Marjorie Luz

texts.es: Marjorie es una joven de 21 años estudiante de cosmiatria,trabaja como cosmetologa y sueña con tener su propio salon de belleza Maryorie es una joven emprendedora que ha sabido salir adelante con la ayuda de sus padres, pero por motivos economicos no podia seguir estudiando y tuvo que trabajar duro para ello, Marjorie agradece a Edaprospo por el prestamo ya que eso le permite seguir estudiando y asi poder comprar sus materiales que requiere en el instituto, Marjorie agradece a los Inversionionistas Kiva por la ayuda brindada y dice "Muchas gracias Kiva que Dios los Bendiga"
texts.en: Marjorie is a young 21 year old cosmetology student.  She works as a cosmetologist and has her own beauty salon.  Marjorie is a young entrepreneur who has gotten ahead with the help of her parents but had to work very hard to be able to continue studying.  Marjorie is grateful to Edaprospo for the loan that has allowed her to get ahead and buy the materials she needs.  Marjorie is grateful to the Kiva lenders and says “Thank you very much to Kiva and may God bless you.”

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Marcial Raymundo

texts.es: MARCIAL RAYMUNDO: Es un señor trabajador, originario de la Comunidad de Kligna, ubicada aproximadamente a 90 kilómetros del municipio de Puerto Cabezas. Está casado, tiene 3 hijos en edad escolar. Cuenta con una experiencia de más de una década de ser maestro de educación primaria en su comunidad. Su esposa es comerciante de una pequeña pulpería. Con el fin de mejorar las condiciones de su hogar y tener una vivienda más digna y segura para su familia, solicita un préstamo para mejorar su vivienda que es de  madera y tambo. Con su préstamo quiere comprar materiales de construcción: madera, zinc, clavos, pintura y cubrir costos de mano de obra. Su sueño es llegar a tener una vivienda de concreto (cemento) porque es de mayor durabilidad.
texts.en:
Marcial Raymundo is a hard working man, originally from the Kligna community, located approximately 90 kilometers from the Puerto Cabezas municipality. He is married and has 3 children in school. He has more than a decade of experience as a primary school teacher in his community. 

His wife is a merchant with a small grocery store. He requests a loan to improve his wooden home on stilts in order to improve the conditions of his household and to have a safer and more dignified home for his family.

He wants to buy building materials with the loan: wood, tin, nails, paint and to cover labor costs. His dream is to end up with a concrete (cement) home because it is more durable.

loans.use: to paint and improve his home made of wood and on stilts.

loans.name: Solidario Rosas De Villa Nueva Group

texts.es: Rosalía es viuda, tiene 6 hijos de los cuales todos tiene familia propia, inicio su negocio hace 20 años cuando enviudo, y tuvo que luchar para sacar adelante a sus hijos ella se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva y producto de Medicina, ella solicita el crédito para invertir en el negocio(compra de ropa) ya que las ventas han aumentado y no cuenta con suficiente capital para trabajar.
texts.en: Rosalia is a widow with four children, each with their own families.  She started her own business 20 years ago when she widowed and had to struggle to support her children.  She sells new clothing and natural medicines.  She is asking for a loan to buy clothing since her sales have increased and she doesn’t have enough working capital.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Kevelyn Janeth

texts.es:
La señora Kevelyn de 26  años de edad es casada,  tiene un hijo que dependen de ella vive con su esposo, en su propia casa en una comunidad  de San Lorenzo,  valle al sur de Honduras, se dedica desde hace 02  años  al negocio de venta de ropa usada.
Kevelyn sus clientes son los amigos y personas que visita a diario en su comunidad y lugares aledaños, está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de blusas, vestidos, camias, pantalones clasificados y poder surtir su negocio.
Con el apoyo de este préstamo pretende mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida, uno de sus sueños es hacer crecer su negocio.
 

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Mayo del 2015.
texts.en:
Kevelyn is 26 years old, married, and lives with her husband in a San Lorenzo community in the Honduran valley.  She has son who depends on her and has been selling used clothing for two years.

Kevelyn’s customers are her friends and people from her and surrounding communities who visit her daily.  She is asking for this loan to buy blouses, dresses, shirts, and pants so she can stock her business. 

She wants to improve her income and quality of life.  One of her dreams is grow her business.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - May 2015.

loans.use: to stock her business.

loans.name: Ricardo Andrés

texts.es: Ricardo de 35 años, es un emprendedor hombre que hizo realidad su sueño de prosperidad  tras haberle comprado a un amigo su negocio de venta de cervezas, hoy en día  lleva 10 años de funcionando en su local ofreciendo cervezas nacionales, extranjeras y licores a los residentes del municipio de Chocontá en el departamento de Cundinamarca,  en el que ofrece un espacio para la diversión y el esparcimiento en el que todos los días pueden disfrutar sus vecinos, trabajadores del sector y transeúntes a partir de las 3 p.m. hasta las 10 p.m. de este servicio.   Ricardo está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para surtir con licores y cervezas su negocio.  El considera que esta inversión mejorará el inventarío y podrá aprovechar promociones de productos para mejorar la rentabilidad.  Ricardo es padre de una niña de tres años de edad a quien en compañía de su cónyuge le brindan mucho cariño y se preocupan por su bienestar, por ello su meta familiar es pagarle sus estudios en un colegio privado.  Su principal desafío es cumplir con sus obligaciones financieras y comprar surtido al por mayor.
texts.en: Ricardo is 35 years old and an enterprising man who made his dream a reality by buying a beer-selling business from a friend.  He’s been doing this for 10 years from his shop and sells domestic and imported beers and liquor to the Chocontra residents, within the Cundinamarca department.  There he offers a space for fun, and where his neighbors, local workers, and transients can enjoy themselves from 3:00 pm to 10:00 pm.  Ricardo is asking for his first Kiva loan through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo to stock up on liquor and beers for his business.  He believes that this investment will improve his inventory so he can take advantage of promotions for more profit.  Ricardo is the father of a three-year-old girl and he and his wife love her very much and worry about her wellbeing.  His family goal is to pay for her education in a private school.  His main challenge is meeting his financial obligations and buy stock in quantity.

loans.use: to stock his business.

loans.name: Raziya

texts.ru: Разия, 38 лет, замужем, воспитывает 4 детей. Разия в качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи, работает учителем в средней школе, также занимается разведением скота и полеводством. Начав этот бизнес с 15,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду на сегодняшний день Разия имеет в хозяйстве корову, лошадь и 20 овец. На земельном участке мерою 0,40 Га собственной и 1,0 Га арендованной земли выращивает фасоль. Вся деятельность приносит ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 16,000 сом (KGS). Разия обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) на покупку удобрений, топлива для обработки почвы и выращивания экологически чистой фасоли. Разия является лидером группы "Эркиндик", в которой всего состоят 3 человека. Доходы от кредита Разия планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса.
texts.en: Raziya is 38 years old, married and raising 4 children. To provide the primary income for her family, Raziya works as a teacher at a secondary school and is also involved in raising livestock and in farming. Having started this business with 15,000 som (KGS), thanks to her hard work, today Raziya has a cow, horse and 20 sheep on her farm. She grows beans on 0.40 hectares of her own and 1.0 hectares of leased land. All of her businesses yield a monthly profit of 16,000 som (KGS). Raziya requested a loan in the amount of 30,000 som (KGS) from the Bai Tushum Bank to buy fertilizers, fuel for cultivating the land and growing organic beans. Raziya is the leader of the Arkindik group that consists of only 3 people. Raziya plans to invest the earnings from the loan into further developing her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, fuel for cultivating the land and growing organic beans

loans.name: Gertha

texts.fr: Gertha, 38 ans, vit en union libre et est  mère de quatre enfants. Elle vend des chaussures usagées depuis de longues années.  Le crédit lui facilite le renouvellement de ses stocks, un petit coup de pouce qui contribue beaucoup au progrès de l’activité.
texts.en:
38-year-old Gertha, lives in common-law and is the mother of four children. She has been selling used shoes for many years.

This loan will facilitate renewing her stock, a little boost that will contribute much to the business' development.

loans.use: buy men's shoes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to lease more land to expand her farming activity.

loans.name: Kenia Rosibel

texts.es:
La señora  Kenia de 24 años de edad, es casada  tiene dos hijos que dependen de ella vive con sus hijos sola ya que su esposo esta en los Estados Unidos, posee  casa propia y vive en una comunidad  de San Lorenzo,  valle al sur de Honduras.
Doña Kenia se dedica desde hace 01 año  al negocio de venta de tortillas vende este producto con los amigos y personas que vienen a su casa a diario a comprar  las tortillas.
Doña Kenia está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de maíz,  leña y cal que son la materia prima para hacer las tortillas. Con el apoyo de este préstamo pretende mejorar un poco su calidad de vida gracias al aumento de  sus ingresos.
 Su sueño es mejorar su negocio y su casa.

San Lorenzo, Honduras -  Mayo del 2015.
texts.en:
Kenia is 24 years old, married, and has two children who depend on her for support.  She and her children live together and her husband is in the United States.  She has a home of her own and lives in a San Lorenzo community within the southern Honduras valley.

Kenia has been selling tortillas for a year and sells to Friends and people who go to her house to buy tortillas daily.

Kenia is asking for a loan to buy dried corn, firewood, and lime which are the primary ingredients for making tortillas.  She plans to improve her quality of life a bit, through increased income, thanks to this loan.

Her dream is to improve her business and home.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - May 2015.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for topdressing her crops to get a better harvest for family use and those of clients in the market in need of food supply.

loans.name: Tikuoneni Group

texts.en:
Rihana is a widow aged 43, with five children. From the five children only two have access to education. She manages her family every day by selling fritters and Irish potatoes by the side of the road. She does this business in order to be financially stable and to improve her family's well being. 

When Rihana gets a loan, she wants to expand her business by buying more bags of Irish potatoes and flour. Her future plan is to buy a house for her children. Through the loan that the organization provides, she is now able to send her children to private schools.

loans.use: to buy fritters and Irish poatoes.

loans.name: Marie Sherlyne

texts.fr: Sherlyne possède une petite boulanger depuis 7 ans déjà. Elle vend aussi des provisions alimentaires. Dans le but d’assurer la croissance de son activité, elle cherche du financement pour augmenter son stock de produits alimentaires et des matières premières pour produire du pain.
texts.en:
Sherlyne has been running a small bakery for already seven years. She also sells food supplies.

To ensure the development of her business, she is seeking funds to increase her stock of food products and raw materials to bake bread.

loans.use: buy bags of flour

loans.name: Génia

texts.fr: Génia a 38 ans. Elle est mariée et a un fils. Son activité est un petit commerce de revente de chaussures usagées. Dans le but d’assurer la croissance de son activité, elle s’est fait trouver un financement à Palmis Mikwofinans Sosyal. Elle utilise le crédit pour augmenter son stock.
texts.en:
Genia is 38 years old. She is married and has a son. She runs a small business reselling used shoes.

To ensure the growth of her business, she found some financing with Palmis Mikwofinans Sosyal. She will use the loan to increase her stock.

loans.use: buy used shoes

loans.name: Mzia

texts.en:
Mzia is a 61-year-old married woman from Samtredia district. She has a pensioner husband, son and daughter-in-law. Mzia is the only breadwinner in the family, who works as a private doctor and has her own income. 

However, she is unable to satisfy all her family's needs and requires additional support to start a new business. 

According to the above mentioned situation, Mzia lacks the access to capital markets and financial institutions to obtain credit for starting a business, as they require stable income and business experience.  The Start Up program created by Kiva and Credo enabled Mzia to get a loan of $2,000 and start a business.  She will purchase a local store, that is functioning now and has it's own loyal costumers. She will purchase additional products and have money for working capital.

Mzia thinks that the business will be profitable, as it is in great location and the only business of this kind in the area. The family will have a stable income, which enables them to cover everyday costs. Mzia will get an opportunity to be involved in her own business and tackle the financial difficulties.

loans.use: to purchase a local store and have money for working capital.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Sharifa

texts.ru:
51 летняя мастерица швеи это Шарифа. Она просто обожает шить и кроить. 5 года Шарифа идет по стопам маме. Ее мама раньше тоже занималась этой сфере деятельности. 
Шарифа ни смотря на свой возраст, старается зарабатывать и помочь мужу обеспечить семью. Она замужем и имеет детей. Ее старший сын женат. Ее муж водитель такси, и предоставляя услуги такси, он зарабатывает. Шарифу в работе помогает невестка. 
Шарифа хочет ускорить процесс работы и путем увеличить доход. Для ускорения процесс работы, ей необходимо приобрести новую многофункциональную машинку. Но для купли средств у нее нет денежных средств, и она решила обратиться за кредитом. Шарифа надеется на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en:
Sharifa is a 51-year-old sewing master. She simply adores cutting and sewing. Sharifa has been following her mother's footsteps for 5 years. Her mother was previously involved in this business.

Sharifa, despite her age, tries to earn money and help her husband to provide for the family. She is married and has children. Her oldest son is married. Her husband is a taxi driver and earns a living by providing a taxi service. Sharifa's daughter-in-law helps her with her work.

Sharifa wants to speed up her work process and, thus, increase her income. She needs to purchase a new multifunctional sewing machine in order to speed up her work, but does not have money for this purchase and decided to request a loan. Sharifa relies on You for support.

loans.use: to purchase a new sewing machine

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more stock of tree seedlings of different species and hopes this will enable him to meet his customers' demands and get more income.

loans.name: Dinora Liliana

texts.es:
Liliana, de 24 años de edad, está casada y tiene 2 dos hijos, los cuales son su motivo para luchar cada día.

Liliana, se ha dedicado a la compra y venta de pescado desde hace 2 años y la realiza en las afueras de la comunidad donde vive.

Lilian, con el financiamiento del crédito comprará más pescado y camarones, lo cual le permitirá un mejor ingreso para su hogar.

Lilian, a futuro sueña con darle una mejor calidad de vida a sus pequeños, darles la educación que ellos necesitan para que en un futuro sean unas personas profesionales.
texts.en:
Liliana is 24 years old, married and has two children who are her main motivation for striving every day.

Lilian has been buying and selling fish for the past two years outside her community.

Lilian will use the money from this loan to buy fish and shrimp and increasing her household income.

Lilian dreams of providing a better quality of life for her children, providing them the education that they need so that they can become professionals in the future.

loans.use: to buy fish and shrimp.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a refrigerator for cooling bottled soft drinks as well as milk and water.

loans.name: Recho

texts.en: Recho is a married woman. She describes herself to be social. She operates a retail business where she sells tea seedlings. She has been involved in this business for 20 years. Her business is located in a good place and her primary customers are tea farmers. She describes her biggest business challenge to be bad weather. She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy more seedlings. Her business goal is to supply seedlings in large scale within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will expand her business. This is her second loan with SMEP Microfinance bank. Her previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy more seedlings

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a tricycle for waste management in her community

loans.name: Evalyn

texts.en: Evalyn is a married woman. She has four children. She describes herself to be social. She operates a retail business where she sells fruits, vegetables, and cereals. She has been involved in this business for eight years. She will use the Kes 10,000 loan to buy more stock of fruits, vegetables, and cereals. She hopes that in the future, she will expand her business. This is her first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy more stock of fruits, vegetables, and cereals.

loans.name: Leah

texts.en: Leah is a married woman. She describes herself to be dynamic and reliable. She operates a retail business where she sells potatoes, onions, caps and other items. She has been involved in this business for six years. Her business is located in a busy area and her primary customers are of all types. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds. She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy more stock of potatoes, onions and other items. Her business goal is to have a large-scale business within five years. This is her first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy more stock of potatoes, onions and other items

loans.name: Yeredon Group

texts.fr:
Adama est l’homme qui tient la corne du bœuf en main. Il est  cultivateur Malien, agé de cinquante-neuf (59) Ans. Il n’a pas eu la chance d’aller à l’école.
Il est père de 15 enfants  dont 03 seulement  vont à l’école. Les enfants sont entre vingt-cinq(25) à sept(07) ans.
Sa femme vent des condiments.
 Adama a fait recourt au prêt  du RMCR pour l’embouche bovine, il fait ses achats et vents dans les différents marché de sa zone. Le bénéfice mensuel  que Adama gagne est salutaire.  Ce montant lui permet de prendre en charge les frais médicaux, scolarité et les dépenses de famille. Son rêve est de beaucoup gagner toujours.
texts.en:
Adama is the man holding the ox's horn. He is a 59-year-old Malian farmer, and did not have the opportunity to go to school.

He is the father of 15 children, of whom only three attend school. The children are between seven and 25 years of age. His wife sells condiments.

Adama has requested a loan from RMCR for cattle fattening. He buys and sells at local area markets. The monthly profits earned by Adama are salutary. This amount enables him to take care of the medical bills, school and family expenses. His dream is to earn even more.

loans.use: buy oxen for fattening and resale

loans.name: Tasian

texts.en:
Tasian lives in Hoima, Uganda. He is 43 years old, married, and charged with the responsibility of taking care of seven children. Three of them attend school. He has been in business for many years from which he has been able to look after his family.

Tasian hopes to develop and expand his business to new areas and to pay school fees for his children. However, bad roads are still a big challenge to his business, especially the rainy season where roads are almost impassable.

He will use the loan to buy more beans to sell ahead of the peak season.

loans.use: to buy more beans to sell

loans.name: Elmira

texts.ru: Эльмира, 36 лет, замужем. У нее высшее образование, в качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи, работает учителем в средней школе, также занимается разведением скота и полеводством. Благодаря упорному труду Эльмиры, на сегодняшний день у нее есть 2 коровы. На земельном участке мерою 1,40 Га собственной земли выращивает фасоль. Вся деятельность приносит ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 17,000 сом (KGS). Эльмира обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 20,000 сом (KGS) на покупку удобрений, топлива для обработки почвы и выращивания экологически чистой фасоли. Эльмира является участником группы "Эркиндик", в которой всего состоят 3 человека. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса и увеличение поголовья овец.
texts.en: Elmira is 36 years old, married. She has a college education and, to provide the primary income for her family, works as a teacher at a secondary school and is also involved in raising livestock and in farming. Thanks to Elmira's hard work, today she has 2 cows and grows beans on 1.40 hectares of land. All of her businesses yield a monthly profit in the amount of 17,000 som (KGS). Elmira requested a loan in the amount of 20,000 som (KGS) from the Bai Tushum Bank to buy fertilizers, fuel for cultivating the land and growing organic beans. Elmira is a member of the Arkindik group that consists of only 3 people. She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into further developing her business and increasing her sheep headcount.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, fuel for cultivating the land and growing organic beans

loans.name: Yesenia

texts.en: Yesenia is a working mom who lives in Tabasco with her family. Every morning, Yesenia wakes up at dawn to go to work so she can save enough to put a roof over her children’s heads. Together with her husband, she make around USD 12,000 a year and finally after years of hard work and saving as much as they can, they can begin working on their home so their children can grow up in a homey and safe environment. However, they need this loan to start building right away, and she can complete paying for all the materials necessary to start the building process. Yesenia and her husband will work on the construction of their home along with certified technicians who will provide all the assistance and support needed to make sure their new home meets all the safety and quality standards.

loans.use: to buy materials to build her house

loans.name: Nimissa Group

texts.fr:
Celle qui tient la daba soulevé au bout sur la photo est Ténéba
Ténéba est une femme de 46 ans mariée et mère de 7 enfants. Cinq de ses enfants sont scolarisés.
Ténéba quitta l’école au second cycle  pour le mariage.
Elle vit en milieu rural au Mali avec son mari paysan et ses enfants.
Ténéba fait recourt au RMCR pour avoir de l’argent afin de mener à bon port ses activités champêtres.
Elle rêve d’assurer l’autosuffisance alimentaire  et l’autonomie financière dans sa famille. 
Elle espère que le soutien de l’institution la permettra de réaliser son rêve.
Les fonds que Ténéba  a reçus du RMCR seront intégralement investis dans l’achat des semences d’arachide et d’intrants agricole.
Elle cultive de l’arachide depuis 7 ans, elle reste attachée à cette activité à cause du profit qu’elle en tire.
L’intérêt que génère l’activité  sert à payer  la scolarisation de ses enfants, les frais sanitaire et l’achat d’habits additionnels pour sa famille.
Elle envisage de faire un intérêt de 175000FCFA après récolte.
Le déficit pluviométrie, la hausse des prix des semences sont des problèmes aux quels Ténéba fait face souvent dans l’exercice de son activité.
texts.en:
Teneba is the one holding the daba (short-handled hoe) in the picture. She is a 46-year-old married woman with seven children. Five of her children attend school. Ténéba left school during the second cycle to get married. She lives in rural Mali with her peasant husband and her children.

Ténéba calls upon RMCR to have the funds to pursue her agricultural activities. She dreams to ensure food self-sufficiency and financial independence for her family. She hopes support from the institution will enable her to achieve her dream.

The funds Teneba received from RMCR will be fully invested in purchasing groundnut seeds and agricultural inputs. She has been growing groundnuts for the past seven years, and remains committed to this activity because of the profits.

Profits generated by the business pays for her children's schooling, health costs and buyiing additional clothes for her family. She is hoping to attain profits of 175,000 CFA francs after harvest. Lack of rain and the increase of seed prices are problems faced by Teneba in her business.

loans.use: buy seeds and agricultural inputs for her field of groundnuts

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a single woman. She has 1 child. She operates a retail business where she sells cereals, flour and other items. She has been involved in this business for 3 years. Her business is located in an area with potential. 

She describes her biggest business challenge to be price fluctuations. She will use the Kes 40,000 loan to buy more stock of cereals. Her business goal is to be a supplier within 5 years. This is her second loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy more stock of cereals

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cartons of ovaltine, milk, and baby food

loans.name: Alpha M.

texts.en: This is 30-year-old Alpha M. He is married, and has two school-going children who are eight and six years old. He has two additional dependents who live with him to be fostered.  In 2005, Alpha M established his electronics, cosmetics and musical set business.  Working 6 days a week and 11 hours a day, he earns about Le 6,661,000 every month from this business. He would like a loan of Le 5,000,000. Alpha M has already received and successfully repaid one loan and now requires a new loan in order to purchase electronics items. In the future, Alpha M plans to improve his business. He was fortunate to complete his house but was not able to buy a motorbike as previously planned. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase electronics items.

loans.name: Samina

texts.en:
Samina  is 47 years old, married woman and a mother of 5 children. She is doing business of tailoring for many years to support her husband. She accepted the fact that if her husband works alone for their family, they will not be able to meet the expenses of household with the educational needs of children. That is why she started tailoring at home to support her family well. She, together with her husband, manages their household while operating a business. 

At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses. Now she has requested for a loan of 40000 PKR  to purchase more reels of threads, packs of buttons, ribbons and laces for meeting the orders on time. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. Samina  hopes to grow her business and dreams of providing better standard of living to her family members.

loans.use: to purchase more reels of threads, packs of buttons, ribbons and laces for meeting the orders on time and improving the family's standard of living

loans.name: Julio

texts.en:
Julio is 53 years old his and wife works as a saleswoman and the couple have 2 sons Julio works as a mini bus driver 

Julio needs a loan to buy tires for his vehicle Julio works hard and he hopes you can help him his wife is busy because she has a debt so Julio needs help.  He is responsible and he is healthy

loans.use: to buy tires for his vehicle

loans.name: Umarr

texts.en: This is 29-year-old Umarr.  He is married and has a six-year-old school-going child. In 2012, Umarr established his new and used vehicle tires business.  Working 6 days a week and 11 hours a day, he earns about SLL 2,700,000 every month from this business. He would like a loan of SLL 5,000,000. Umarr has already received and successfully repaid one loan, and now requires a new loan in order to buy assorted tires (new and old). In the future, Umarr plans to reinvest and expand his business and purchase a piece of land. His previous loan helped him greatly, as he was able to buy a motorbike and his business has improved.  He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy assorted tires (new and old).

loans.name: Joshua

texts.en:
Joshua is a married man. He has 1 child. He operates a transport business where he transports customers using his motorcycle. He has been involved in this business for 3 years. His business is located in an area with potential. 

He describes his biggest business challenge to be price fluctuations. He will use the Kes 45,000 loan to buy another motorcycle. This is his fourth loan with SMEP Microfinance bank. Previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy another motorcycle for his expanding transport service

loans.name: Andy Umarr

texts.en: This is 45 year-old Andy Umarr.  He is divorced and has two children who are 12 and 9 years old and going to school. In 2000, Andy Umarr established his cane chairs, cupboard, and divider etc business.  Working 6 days a week and 11 hours a day, he earns about Le 3,200,000 every month from this business. He would like a loan of Le 5,000,000. Andy Umarr has already received and successfully repaid three loans, and now requires a new loan in order to purchase a power tiller machine and table for splitting boards. In the future, Andy Umarr plans to open another workshop.  This loan will help achieve his goal. The previous loan helped him a lot in his business; he bought a vehicle that he can use to move around town to customers to get contacts, bought a piece of land and his children are in school. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase a power tiller machine and table for splitting boards.

loans.name: Dovudkhon

texts.ru: Довудхон житель не большого района под названием Дангара. Он семейный человек и отец шестерых детей. У него одна дочка и пять сыновей. Жена Довудхона работает в одном из местных колхозов. А сам Довудхон дома занимается выращиванием скотин. Он каждый свой день проводит на скотном дворе. Ему нравится своя работа, все его соседи занимаются сельскохозяйственной деятельностью и его предки тоже занимались. Довудхон обратился за кредитом, потому что хочет расширить животноводческую деятельность. Он собирается купить пару голов скотин. Он верит в Вас и пологается на свою удачу.
texts.en: Dovudkhon is a resident of a small district by the name of Dangara. He is a family man and a father of six children. He has one daughter and five sons. Dovudkhon's wife works at one of the local collective farms. And Dovudkhon raises livestock at home. He spends every day at the livestock yeard. He likes his work. All of his neighbors are involved in agriculture, and his ancestors were too. Dovudkhon requested this loan because he wants to expand his animal husbandry business. He plans to buy a couple of heads of livestock. He believes in You and relies on his fortune.

loans.use: to buy a couple of heads of livestock

loans.name: Fatmata S

texts.en:
This is 27 year-old Fatmata.  She is married, and has a 6 years old and school going child. She has 1 additional dependent, who live with her to be fostered.  In 2012, Fatmata. established her provisions - mayonnaise, sugar, ketchup, peak milk etc business. Working 6 days a week and 11 hours a day, she earns about Le 1,918,800 every month from this business.

 She would like a loan in the amount of Le 5,000,000. Fatmata. has already received and successfully repaid 1 loan, and now requires a new loan in order to purchase cartons of assorted provisions. In the future, Fatmata. plans to reinvest and expand the business and provide quality education for her child. Previously, she has improved her business greatly and now have most of the goods demanded by customers.  Her child is now in school.  She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase cartons of assorted provisions for sale in her store

loans.name: Dahiru

texts.en: Dahiru is a Babban Gona maize farmer from Rimi Village. Dahiru joined Babban Gona to create a better life for his children. In the past, Dahiru suffered from poor yields that crippled his ability to pay for his children's school fees.
